Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The Cold damage increases by 1d6 for each spell slot level above 1.
hVcbJwtsvzfFPmZO.materials_component: a drop of water or a piece of ice

hd3JZprvOwTX7QK1.name: Hand Crossbow (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)

hdOImQziS8ffNnk5.name: Shield
hdOImQziS8ffNnk5.description: You gain the Armor Class benefit of a Shield only if you have training with it.

hmnIRrpaFhjOgdUE.name: Scrying
hmnIRrpaFhjOgdUE.description:
You can see and hear a creature you choose that is on the same plane of existence as you. The target makes a Wisdom saving throw, which is modified (see the tables below) by how well you know the target and the sort of physical connection you have to it. The target doesn't know what it is making the save against, only that it feels uneasy.

Your Knowledge of the Target Is …Save Modifier
Secondhand (heard of the target)+5
Firsthand (met the target)+0
Extensive (know the target well)−5
You Have the Target's …Save Modifier
Picture or other likeness−2
Garment or other possession−4
Body part, lock of hair, or bit of nail−10

On a successful save, the target isn't affected, and you can't use this spell on it again for 24 hours.

On a failed save, the spell creates an Invisible, intangible sensor within 10 feet of the target. You can see and hear through the sensor as if you were there. The sensor moves with the target, remaining within 10 feet of it for the duration. If something can see the sensor, it appears as a luminous orb about the size of your fist.

Instead of targeting a creature, you can target a location you have seen. When you do so, the sensor appears at that location and doesn't move.
hmnIRrpaFhjOgdUE.materials_component: a focus worth 1,000+ GP, such as a crystal ball, mirror, or water-filled font

hoJ27ZfNj6LIlgzf.name: Detect Magic
hoJ27ZfNj6LIlgzf.description:
For the duration, you sense the presence of magical effects within 30 feet of yourself. If you sense such effects, you can take the Magic action to see a faint aura around any visible creature or object in the area that bears the magic, and if an effect was created by a spell, you learn the spell's school of magic.

The spell is blocked by 1 foot of stone, dirt, or wood; 1 inch of metal; or a thin sheet of lead.

hwjjBtV0Jm7o4582.name: Ray of Sickness
hwjjBtV0Jm7o4582.description:
You shoot a greenish ray at a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 2d8 Poison damage and has the &Reference[poisoned] condition until the end of your next turn.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d8 for each spell slot level above 1.

i85zlI8RmuI6xYw5.name: Sending
i85zlI8RmuI6xYw5.description:
You send a short message of 25 words or fewer to a creature you have met or a creature described to you by someone who has met it. The target hears the message in its mind, recognizes you as the sender if it knows you, and can answer in a like manner immediately. The spell enables targets to understand the meaning of your message.

You can send the message across any distance and even to other planes of existence, but if the target is on a different plane than you, there is a 5 percent chance that the message doesn't arrive. You know if the delivery fails.

Upon receiving your message, a creature can block your ability to reach it again with this spell for 8 hours. If you try to send another message during that time, you learn that you are blocked, and the spell fails.

iD5121TXziB6ZcSt.name: Warhammer
iD5121TXziB6ZcSt.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] pushes the target up to 10 feet straight away from itself.

ifCCry0YNCvnIKmN.name: Vitriolic Sphere
ifCCry0YNCvnIKmN.description:
You point at a location within range, and a glowing, 1-foot-diameter ball of acid streaks there and explodes in a 20-foot-radius Sphere. Each creature in that area makes a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 10d4 Acid damage and another [[/damage 5d4 type=acid]] damage at the end of its next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half the initial damage only.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The initial damage increases by 2d4 for each spell slot level above 4.

ijY9hc5b4AQkz5ZS.name: Find Familiar
ijY9hc5b4AQkz5ZS.description:
You gain the service of a familiar, a spirit that takes an animal form you choose: Bat, Cat, Frog, Hawk, Lizard, Octopus, Owl, Rat, Raven, Spider, Weasel, or another Beast that has a Challenge Rating of 0. Appearing in an unoccupied space within range, the familiar has the statistics of the chosen form (see appendix B), though it is a Celestial, Fey, or Fiend (your choice) instead of a Beast. Your familiar acts independently of you, but it obeys your commands.

Telepathic Connection. While your familiar is within 100 feet of you, you can communicate with it telepathically. Additionally, as a Bonus Action, you can see through the familiar's eyes and hear what it hears until the start of your next turn, gaining the benefits of any special senses it has.

Finally, when you cast a spell with a range of touch, your familiar can deliver the touch. Your familiar must be within 100 feet of you, and it must take a Reaction to deliver the touch when you cast the spell.

Combat. The familiar is an ally to you and your allies. It rolls its own Initiative and acts on its own turn. A familiar can't attack, but it can take other actions as normal.

Disappearance of the Familiar. When the familiar drops to 0 Hit Points, it disappears. It reappears after you cast this spell again. As a Magic action, you can temporarily dismiss the familiar to a pocket dimension. Alternatively, you can dismiss it forever. As a Magic action while it is temporarily dismissed, you can cause it to reappear in an unoccupied space within 30 feet of you. Whenever the familiar drops to 0 Hit Points or disappears into the pocket dimension, it leaves behind in its space anything it was wearing or carrying.

One Familiar Only. You can't have more than one familiar at a time. If you cast this spell while you have a familiar, you instead cause it to adopt a new eligible form.
ijY9hc5b4AQkz5ZS.materials_component: burning incense worth 10+ GP, which the spell consumes

j529u2kIzgwyFvaW.name: Invisibility
j529u2kIzgwyFvaW.description:
A creature you touch has the &Reference[invisible apply=false] condition until the spell ends. The spell ends early immediately after the target makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 2.

jLa5l9pntsTVrMKH.name: Shortsword
jLa5l9pntsTVrMKH.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the start of the assassin's next turn.

jQJwpCjrh2Svg36q.name: Detect Magic
jQJwpCjrh2Svg36q.description:
For the duration, you sense the presence of magical effects within 30 feet of yourself. If you sense such effects, you can take the Magic action to see a faint aura around any visible creature or object in the area that bears the magic, and if an effect was created by a spell, you learn the spell's school of magic.

The spell is blocked by 1 foot of stone, dirt, or wood; 1 inch of metal; or a thin sheet of lead.

jRXMMWyLsf3cPmSP.name: Carry Weight Adjustment
jRXMMWyLsf3cPmSP.description: This item serves to offset the carpet's computed carry weight capacity in accordance with the carpet's dimensions.

jb9GlwVmpAclDUSd.name: Divine Aid
jb9GlwVmpAclDUSd.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplCureWounds]{Cure Wounds} (level 2 version), @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplLesserRest]{Lesser Restoration}, or @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplRemoveCurs]{Remove Curse}, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

jclLNcK4S0eIgQqs.name: Locate Object
jclLNcK4S0eIgQqs.description:
Describe or name an object that is familiar to you. You sense the direction to the object's location if that object is within 1,000 feet of you. If the object is in motion, you know the direction of its movement.

The spell can locate a specific object known to you if you have seen it up close—within 30 feet—at least once. Alternatively, the spell can locate the nearest object of a particular kind, such as a certain kind of apparel, jewelry, furniture, tool, or weapon.

This spell can't locate an object if any thickness of lead blocks a direct path between you and the object.

jdJ9mSsHzJRBSwJK.name: Detect Magic
jdJ9mSsHzJRBSwJK.description:
For the duration, you sense the presence of magical effects within 30 feet of yourself. If you sense such effects, you can take the Magic action to see a faint aura around any visible creature or object in the area that bears the magic, and if an effect was created by a spell, you learn the spell's school of magic.

The spell is blocked by 1 foot of stone, dirt, or wood; 1 inch of metal; or a thin sheet of lead.

jjedGyzgRuoeugFI.name: Detect Magic
jjedGyzgRuoeugFI.description:
For the duration, you sense the presence of magical effects within 30 feet of yourself. If you sense such effects, you can take the Magic action to see a faint aura around any visible creature or object in the area that bears the magic, and if an effect was created by a spell, you learn the spell's school of magic.

The spell is blocked by 1 foot of stone, dirt, or wood; 1 inch of metal; or a thin sheet of lead.

jluXgJ7dG39ONk0R.name: Mirror Image
jluXgJ7dG39ONk0R.description:
Three illusory duplicates of yourself appear in your space. Until the spell ends, the duplicates move with you and mimic your actions, shifting position so it's impossible to track which image is real.

Each time a creature hits you with an attack roll during the spell's duration, roll a [[/r (@flags.dnd-players-handbook.mirrorImages)d6kh1cs>2#Duplicate destroyed]]{d6 for each} of your remaining duplicates. If any of the d6s rolls a 3 or higher, one of the duplicates is hit instead of you, and the duplicate is destroyed. The duplicates otherwise ignore all other damage and effects. The spell ends when all three duplicates are destroyed.

A creature is unaffected by this spell if it has the &Reference[blinded apply=false] condition, &Reference[blindsight], or &Reference[truesight].

k0eU3EIGLCIUzIni.name: Invisibility
k0eU3EIGLCIUzIni.description:
A creature you touch has the &Reference[invisible apply=false] condition until the spell ends. The spell ends early immediately after the target makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 2.

kBI2qYix7GyXmhaD.name: World-Shaking Movement
kBI2qYix7GyXmhaD.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to its Speed. At the end of this movement, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] creates an instantaneous shock wave in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=g4W0ovZxBeUrZKb8]]-[[lookup @target.template.units activity=g4W0ovZxBeUrZKb8]]. Emanation originating from itself. Creatures in that area lose &Reference[Concentration] and, if Medium or smaller, have the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

kJxdj680Yr2u1vqp.name: Mage Armor
kJxdj680Yr2u1vqp.description: You touch a willing creature who isn't wearing armor. Until the spell ends, the target's base AC becomes 13 plus its Dexterity modifier. The spell ends early if the target dons armor.

kOKHbZktHfRffihQ.name: Detect Thoughts
kOKHbZktHfRffihQ.description:
You activate one of the effects below. Until the spell ends, you can activate either effect as a Magic action on your later turns.

Sense Thoughts. You sense the presence of thoughts within 30 feet of yourself that belong to creatures that know languages or are telepathic. You don't read the thoughts, but you know that a thinking creature is present.

The spell is blocked by 1 foot of stone, dirt, or wood; 1 inch of metal; or a thin sheet of lead.

Read Thoughts. Target one creature you can see within 30 feet of yourself or one creature within 30 feet of yourself that you detected with the Sense Thoughts option. You learn what is most on the target's mind right now. If the target doesn't know any languages and isn't telepathic, you learn nothing.

As a Magic action on your next turn, you can try to probe deeper into the target's mind. If you probe deeper, the target makes a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, you discern the target's reasoning, emotions, and something that looms large in its mind (such as a worry, love, or hate). On a successful save, the spell ends. Either way, the target knows that you are probing into its mind, and until you shift your attention away from the target's mind, the target can take an action on its turn to make an [[/check ability=int skill=arc dc=@attributes.spell.dc]] check against your spell save DC, ending the spell on a success.

kPLdXUnQxMINrwVs.name: Detect Magic
kPLdXUnQxMINrwVs.description:
For the duration, you sense the presence of magical effects within 30 feet of yourself. If you sense such effects, you can take the Magic action to see a faint aura around any visible creature or object in the area that bears the magic, and if an effect was created by a spell, you learn the spell's school of magic.

The spell is blocked by 1 foot of stone, dirt, or wood; 1 inch of metal; or a thin sheet of lead.

kUzXgVwiKDTtw9Mo.name: Identify
kUzXgVwiKDTtw9Mo.description:
You touch an object throughout the spell's casting. If the object is a magic item or some other magical object, you learn its properties and how to use them, whether it requires Attunement, and how many charges it has, if any. You learn whether any ongoing spells are affecting the item and what they are. If the item was created by a spell, you learn that spell's name.

If you instead touch a creature throughout the casting, you learn which ongoing spells, if any, are currently affecting it.

kYsTzM5cuWinvQqm.name: Druidcraft
kYsTzM5cuWinvQqm.description:
Whispering to the spirits of nature, you create one of the following effects within range.

Weather Sensor. You create a Tiny, harmless sensory effect that predicts what the weather will be at your location for the next 24 hours. The effect might manifest as a golden orb for clear skies, a cloud for rain, falling snowflakes for snow, and so on. This effect persists for 1 round.

Bloom. You instantly make a flower blossom, a seed pod open, or a leaf bud bloom.

Sensory Effect. You create a harmless sensory effect, such as falling leaves, spectral dancing fairies, a gentle breeze, the sound of an animal, or the faint odor of skunk. The effect must fit in a 5-foot Cube.

Fire Play. You light or snuff out a candle, a torch, or a campfire.

kdc53KLaLU9CW6dh.name: Thunderwave
kdc53KLaLU9CW6dh.description:
You unleash a wave of thunderous energy. Each creature in a 15-foot Cube originating from you makes a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 2d8 Thunder damage and is pushed 10 feet away from you. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only.

In addition, unsecured objects that are entirely within the Cube are pushed 10 feet away from you, and a thunderous boom is audible within 300 feet.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d8 for each spell slot level above 1.

kgZMlH9XtkOvSHqQ.name: Carry Weight Adjustment
kgZMlH9XtkOvSHqQ.description: This item serves to offset the carpet's computed carry weight capacity in accordance with the carpet's dimensions.

kiSJTCgeflbQIcAL.name: Dispel Evil and Good
kiSJTCgeflbQIcAL.description:
For the duration, Celestials, Elementals, Fey, Fiends, and Undead have Disadvantage on attack rolls against you. You can end the spell early by using either of the following special functions.

Break Enchantment. As a Magic action, you touch a creature that is possessed by or has the &Reference[Charmed] or &Reference[Frightened] condition from one or more creatures of the types above. The target is no longer possessed, Charmed, or Frightened by such creatures.

Dismissal. As a Magic action, you target one creature you can see within 5 feet of you that has one of the creature types above. The target must succeed on a Charisma saving throw or be sent back to its home plane if it isn't there already. If they aren't on their home plane, Undead are sent to the Shadowfell, and Fey are sent to the Feywild.

ko31Vae4lE8qo5Ez.name: Lash
ko31Vae4lE8qo5Ez.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one Tentacle attack.

l6QBJ7Y0NAqE3rnq.name: Water Breathing
l6QBJ7Y0NAqE3rnq.description: This spell grants up to ten willing creatures of your choice within range the ability to breathe underwater until the spell ends. Affected creatures also retain their normal mode of respiration.

l7t8gpKOgNTYTAOy.name: Shapechange
l7t8gpKOgNTYTAOy.description:
You shape-shift into another creature for the duration or until you take a Magic action to shape-shift into a different eligible form. The new form must be of a creature that has a Challenge Rating no higher than your level or Challenge Rating. You must have seen the sort of creature before, and it can't be a Construct or an Undead.

When you shape-shift, you gain a number of Temporary Hit Points equal to the Hit Points of the form. The spell ends early if you have no Temporary Hit Points left.

Your game statistics are replaced by the stat block of the chosen form, but you retain your creature type; alignment; personality; Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores; Hit Points; Hit Point Dice; proficiencies; and ability to communicate. If you have the Spellcasting feature, you retain it too.

Upon shape-shifting, you determine whether your equipment drops to the ground or changes in size and shape to fit the new form while you're in it.

lNdiEuYQ2WarE6UR.name: Cure Wounds
lNdiEuYQ2WarE6UR.description:
A creature you touch regains a number of Hit Points equal to 2d8 plus your spellcasting ability modifier.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The healing increases by 2d8 for each spell slot level above 1.

lQDlH8pdy1WcUTMT.name: Minor Illusion
lQDlH8pdy1WcUTMT.description:
You create a sound or an image of an object within range that lasts for the duration. See the descriptions below for the effects of each. The illusion ends if you cast this spell again.

If a creature takes a Study action to examine the sound or image, the creature can determine that it is an illusion with a successful [[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spell.dc]] check against your spell save DC. If a creature discerns the illusion for what it is, the illusion becomes faint to the creature.

Sound. If you create a sound, its volume can range from a whisper to a scream. It can be your voice, someone else's voice, a lion's roar, a beating of drums, or any other sound you choose. The sound continues unabated throughout the duration, or you can make discrete sounds at different times before the spell ends.

Image. If you create an image of an object—such as a chair, muddy footprints, or a small chest—it must be no larger than a 5-foot Cube. The image can't create sound, light, smell, or any other sensory effect. Physical interaction with the image reveals it to be an illusion, since things can pass through it.

lSbRnSVRWsTQoh2w.name: Misty Step
lSbRnSVRWsTQoh2w.description: Briefly surrounded by silvery mist, you teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see.

lUJ9dc6cS9834GvY.name: Guiding Bolt
lUJ9dc6cS9834GvY.description:
You hurl a bolt of light toward a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, it takes 4d6 Radiant damage, and the next attack roll made against it before the end of your next turn has Advantage.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d6 for each spell slot level above 1.

lWC2jp0sRaJILIwH.name: Unicorn's Blessing
lWC2jp0sRaJILIwH.description: The [[lookup @name]] touches another creature with its horn and casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplCureWounds]{Cure Wounds} or @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplLesserRest]{Lesser Restoration} on that creature, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

leUcbtUfszTZvsrL.name: Identify
leUcbtUfszTZvsrL.description:
You touch an object throughout the spell's casting. If the object is a magic item or some other magical object, you learn its properties and how to use them, whether it requires Attunement, and how many charges it has, if any. You learn whether any ongoing spells are affecting the item and what they are. If the item was created by a spell, you learn that spell's name.

If you instead touch a creature throughout the casting, you learn which ongoing spells, if any, are currently affecting it.

lglvYkZZuNa2mBbW.name: Hold Monster
lglvYkZZuNa2mBbW.description:
Choose a creature that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or have the Paralyzed condition for the duration. At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the save, ending the spell on itself on a success.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 5.

liK9CYrnL3t4Ax8t.name: Dispel Evil and Good
liK9CYrnL3t4Ax8t.description:
For the duration, Celestials, Elementals, Fey, Fiends, and Undead have Disadvantage on attack rolls against you. You can end the spell early by using either of the following special functions.

Break Enchantment. As a Magic action, you touch a creature that is possessed by or has the &Reference[Charmed] or &Reference[Frightened] condition from one or more creatures of the types above. The target is no longer possessed, Charmed, or Frightened by such creatures.

Dismissal. As a Magic action, you target one creature you can see within 5 feet of you that has one of the creature types above. The target must succeed on a Charisma saving throw or be sent back to its home plane if it isn't there already. If they aren't on their home plane, Undead are sent to the Shadowfell, and Fey are sent to the Feywild.

lqG4KueiyzdOy01v.name: Animate Trees
lqG4KueiyzdOy01v.description: The [[lookup @name]] magically animates up to two trees it can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=EceTNjzjKWdrMNAy]] feet of itself. Each tree uses the Treant stat block, except it has Intelligence and Charisma scores of 1, it can't speak, and it lacks this action. The tree takes its turn immediately after the treant on the same initiative count, and it obeys the treant. A tree remains animate for 1 day or until it dies, the treant dies, or it is more than 120 feet from the treant. The tree then takes root if possible.

m13Jk0xxCRfVybrr.name: Healing Word
m13Jk0xxCRfVybrr.description:
A creature of your choice that you can see within range regains Hit Points equal to 2d4 plus your spellcasting ability modifier.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The healing increases by 2d4 for each spell slot level above 1.

mPM1yrHMPklU8VcP.name: Cone of Cold
mPM1yrHMPklU8VcP.description:
You unleash a blast of cold air. Each creature in a 60-foot Cone originating from you makes a Constitution saving throw, taking 8d8 Cold damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature killed by this spell becomes a frozen statue until it thaws.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d8 for each spell slot level above 5.
mPM1yrHMPklU8VcP.materials_component: a small crystal or glass cone

mPMsVnGpMgQ8utsG.name: Detect Magic
mPMsVnGpMgQ8utsG.description:
For the duration, you sense the presence of magical effects within 30 feet of yourself. If you sense such effects, you can take the Magic action to see a faint aura around any visible creature or object in the area that bears the magic, and if an effect was created by a spell, you learn the spell's school of magic.

The spell is blocked by 1 foot of stone, dirt, or wood; 1 inch of metal; or a thin sheet of lead.

mmAbduct00000000.name: Abduct
mmAbduct00000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] needn't spend extra movement to move a creature it is grappling.

mmAberrantGround.name: Aberrant Ground
mmAberrantGround.description: The ground in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=zVznqPXgYjETqpQz]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name]] is &Reference[Difficult Terrain].

mmAcidAbsorption.name: Acid Absorption
mmAcidAbsorption.description: Whenever the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is subjected to &Reference[Acid] damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of Hit Points equal to the Acid damage dealt.

mmAcidBreath0000.name: Acid Breath
mmAcidBreath0000.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=qNI6W02jCUQbPpYE]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=qNI6W02jCUQbPpYE]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=qNI6W02jCUQbPpYE]]-foot-long, [[lookup @target.template.width activity=qNI6W02jCUQbPpYE]]-foot-wide Line.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: [[lookup @damage.onSave capitalize activity=qNI6W02jCUQbPpYE]] damage.

mmAcidSpray00000.name: Acid Spray
mmAcidSpray00000.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=20GU2JBM5zJfNPD1]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=20GU2JBM5zJfNPD1]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=20GU2JBM5zJfNPD1]]-[[lookup @target.template.units activity=20GU2JBM5zJfNPD1]]-long, [[lookup @target.template.width activity=20GU2JBM5zJfNPD1]]-[[lookup @target.template.units activity=20GU2JBM5zJfNPD1]]-wide [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=20GU2JBM5zJfNPD1]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

mmAdhesive000000.name: Adhesive (Object Form Only)
mmAdhesive000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] adheres to anything that touches it. A Huge or smaller creature adhered to the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]). Ability checks made to escape this grapple have Disadvantage.

mmAgile000000000.name: Agile
mmAgile000000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] doesn't provoke an &Reference[opportunityattacks]{Opportunity Attack} when it moves out of an enemy's reach.

mmAirForm0000000.name: Air Form
mmAirForm0000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can enter an enemy's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without expending extra movement to do so.

mmAmorphous00000.name: Amorphous
mmAmorphous00000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without expending extra movement to do so.

mmAmphibious0000.name: Amphibious
mmAmphibious0000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can breathe air and water.

mmAntennae000000.name: Antennae
mmAntennae000000.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] targets one [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=dcSC7EuknnM0uoqY]] object—armor or a weapon—worn or carried by a creature within [[lookup @range.value activity=dcSC7EuknnM0uoqY]] feet of itself.

Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=dcSC7EuknnM0uoqY]], the creature with the object.

Failure: The object takes a -1 penalty to the AC it offers (armor) or to its attack rolls (weapon). Armor is destroyed if the penalty reduces its AC to 10, and a weapon is destroyed if its penalty reaches -5. The penalty can be removed by casting the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMending000] spell on the armor or weapon.

Foundry Note

This feature also provides a Damaged Enchantment effect that will modify the targeted object. Due to the fact that the equipment penalty can be applied multiple times, the enchantment needs to be dragged from this item's Effects tab onto the target Item's sheet.

mmAquaticCharge0.name: Aquatic Charge
mmAquaticCharge0.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] swims up to its Swim Speed straight toward an enemy it can see.

mmArcaneProwl000.name: Arcane Prowl
mmArcaneProwl000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can teleport up to [[lookup @range.value activity=a3RqyzU0UqzLJif0]] feet to an unoccupied space it can see, and it makes one [[/item Claw]] attack.

mmAttach00000000.name: Attach
mmAttach00000000.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] attaches to it. While the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is attached, the target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't make Attach attacks against other targets. In addition, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] halves the damage it takes (round down), and the target takes the same amount of damage.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can detach itself by spending 5 feet of movement. The target or a creature within [[lookup @range.value activity=6iLqAufAeEqDOlGs]] feet of it can take an action to try to detach the [[lookup @name lowercase]], doing so by succeeding on a DC [[lookup @check.dc.value activity=6iLqAufAeEqDOlGs]] Strength (Athletics) check.

mmAuraOfAuthorit.name: Aura of Authority
mmAuraOfAuthorit.description: While in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dE4lg9tZyXtoCb5x]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]], the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and its allies have Advantage on attack rolls and saving throws, provided the [[lookup @name lowercase]] doesn't have the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition.

mmAversionToFire.name: Aversion to Fire
mmAversionToFire.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes Fire damage, it has Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

mmBalefulCommand.name: Baleful Command
mmBalefulCommand.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=SzU2lwdbqgoFMuBM]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=SzU2lwdbqgoFMuBM]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=SzU2lwdbqgoFMuBM]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] and &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] conditions until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

mmBanish00000000.name: Banish
mmBanish00000000.description:
Charisma Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=kWKwiAYgyeKBLMNJ]], one creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=kWKwiAYgyeKBLMNJ]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition and is transported to a harmless demiplane until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn, at which point it re­appears in an unoccupied space of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s choice within [[lookup @range.value activity=kWKwiAYgyeKBLMNJ]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure or Success: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't take this action again [[lookup @duration.special activity=kWKwiAYgyeKBLMNJ]].

mmBarbedHide0000.name: Barbed Hide
mmBarbedHide0000.description: At the start of each of its turns, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] deals [[/damage average]] damage to any creature [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=1O5eyc72vPW0UxYZ]].

mmBeaks000000000.name: Beaks
mmBeaks000000000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], or [[/damage average activity=3m1SLqBeMGQF3UaQ]] if [[lookup @activation.condition activity=3m1SLqBeMGQF3UaQ]]

mmBeard000000000.name: Beard
mmBeard000000000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn. Until this poison ends, the target can't regain Hit Points.

mmBeastOfBurden0.name: Beast of Burden
mmBeastOfBurden0.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] counts as one size larger for the purpose of determining its carrying capacity.

mmBeguile0000000.name: Beguile
mmBeguile0000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplCommand000], requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @abilities.cha.dc]]). The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

mmBerserk0000000.name: Berserk
mmBerserk0000000.description:
Whenever the [[lookup @name lowercase]] starts its turn &Reference[Bloodied], roll [[/r 1d6]]. On a 6, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] goes berserk. On each of its turns while berserk, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] attacks the nearest creature it can see. If no creature is near enough to move to and attack, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] attacks an object. Once the [[lookup @name lowercase]] goes berserk, it remains so until it is destroyed or it is no longer Bloodied.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s creator, if within [[lookup @range.value activity=tnkOsrSwEElO2kZM]] feet of the berserk [[lookup @name lowercase]], can try to calm it by taking an action to make a [[/check ability=cha skill=per dc=@abilities.str.dc]] DC 15 Charisma (Persuasion) check; the golem must be able to hear its creator. If this check succeeds, the golem ceases being berserk until the start of its next turn, at which point it resumes rolling for the Berserk trait again if it is still Bloodied.

mmBites000000000.name: Bites
mmBites000000000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], or [[/damage average activity=3Yo83eZUNwX51AcE]] if [[lookup @activation.condition activity=3Yo83eZUNwX51AcE]]

mmBlazingLight00.name: Blazing Light
mmBlazingLight00.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses Spellcasting to cast [[/item Scorching Ray]] (level 3 version).

mmBlindingBreath.name: Blinding Breath
mmBlindingBreath.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=soAO2jRWos8FsxeU]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=soAO2jRWos8FsxeU]]-foot Cone.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

mmBlindingGaze00.name: Blinding Gaze
mmBlindingGaze00.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=B6xM8C2pABIb5o7y]], one creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=B6xM8C2pABIb5o7y]] feet.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition for 1 minute.

Failure or Success: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

mmBlindingSpittl.name: Blinding Spittle
mmBlindingSpittl.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=JfU8KFZkAJxWtrhk]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=JfU8KFZkAJxWtrhk]]-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point within [[lookup @range.value activity=JfU8KFZkAJxWtrhk]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

mmBloodFrenzy000.name: Blood Frenzy
mmBloodFrenzy000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its Hit Points.

mmBloodiedFrenzy.name: Bloodied Frenzy
mmBloodiedFrenzy.description: While &Reference[Bloodied], the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on attack rolls and saving throws.

mmBloodiedFury00.name: Bloodied Fury
mmBloodiedFury00.description: While &Reference[Bloodied], the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on attack rolls.

mmBlurredForm000.name: Blurred Form
mmBlurredForm000.description: Attack rolls against the [[lookup @name lowercase]] are made with Disadvantage unless the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has the Incapacitated condition.

mmBoulder0000000.name: Boulder
mmBoulder0000000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Prone] condition.

mmBoulderToss000.name: Boulder Toss
mmBoulderToss000.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] hurls a boulder at a point it can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=jpC3fk7LJlhH4CDr]] feet.

Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=jpC3fk7LJlhH4CDr]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=jpC3fk7LJlhH4CDr]]-foot-radius Sphere centered on that point.

Failure: [[/damage average]]. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Prone] condition.

Success: Half damage only.

mmBound000000000.name: Bound
mmBound000000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is magically bound to an amulet. While the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and its amulet are on the same plane of existence, the amulet's wearer can telepathically call the [[lookup @name lowercase]] to travel to it, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] knows the distance and direction to the amulet. If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is within 60 feet of the amulet's wearer, half of any damage the wearer takes (round up) is transferred to the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

mmBubbleDash0000.name: Bubble Dash
mmBubbleDash0000.description: While underwater, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to its Swim Speed without provoking &Reference[Opportunity Attacks].

mmBurn0000000000.name: Burn
mmBurn0000000000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a creature or a flammable object, it starts &Reference[burning].

mmCacophony00000.name: Cacophony
mmCacophony00000.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=pyvvXqoxJsjkkP38]], one creature in the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s space.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Deafened apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn. While Deafened, the target also has Disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls.

mmCaptainsCharm0.name: Captain's Charm
mmCaptainsCharm0.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=3o27u4Ww7SmCgc8k]], one creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=3o27u4Ww7SmCgc8k]] feet.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

mmCelestialResto.name: Celestial Restoration
mmCelestialResto.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies, it returns to life in [[/r 1d6#Days]] days and regains all its Hit Points unless @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDispelEvil] is cast on its remains.

mmChain000000000.name: Chain
mmChain000000000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]) from one of two chains, and it has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the grapple ends.

mmCharge00000000.name: Charge
mmCharge00000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to [[lookup @range.special activity=Y2IncZu5BjB42z7l]] straight toward an enemy it can sense.

mmChargedTendril.name: Charged Tendril
mmChargedTendril.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] pulls the target 5 feet straight toward itself.

mmChargingHorn00.name: Charging Horn
mmChargingHorn00.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to half its Speed without provoking &Reference[Opportunity Attacks], and it makes one [[/item Radiant Horn]] attack.

mmCharm000000000.name: Charm
mmCharm000000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplCharmPerso], requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @abilities.cha.dc]]), and the duration is [[lookup @duration.value activity=fcRXSTOlFJShCl52]] hours. The &Reference[Charmed apply=false] target is a willing recipient of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s [[/item .mmBite0000000000]]{Bite}, the damage of which doesn't end the spell. When the spell ends, the target is unaware it was Charmed by the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

mmChill000000000.name: Chill
mmChill000000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses [[/item Spellcasting]] to cast [[/item .mmSpellcasting00.Activity.2CC68ooxyWo6GXU4]]. The dragon can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

mmClaws000000000.name: Claws
mmClaws000000000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]) from both claws.

mmCloakedFlight0.name: Cloaked Flight
mmCloakedFlight0.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses [[/item Spellcasting]] to cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplInvisibili] on itself, and it can fly up to half its Fly Speed. The dragon can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

mmCloudOfInsects.name: Cloud of Insects
mmCloudOfInsects.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=0OkFhjOM80ipoNKy]], one creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=0OkFhjOM80ipoNKy]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has Disadvantage on saving throws to maintain &Reference[Concentration} until the end of its next turn.

Failure or Success: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

mmColdBreath0000.name: Cold Breath
mmColdBreath0000.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=8P7hmd3Nron4RAIv]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=8P7hmd3Nron4RAIv]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=8P7hmd3Nron4RAIv]]-foot Cone.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

mmColdGale000000.name: Cold Gale
mmColdGale000000.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=pVs8BTVDNh54CZ0a]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=pVs8BTVDNh54CZ0a]]-foot-long, [[lookup @target.template.width activity=pVs8BTVDNh54CZ0a]]-foot-wide Line.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target is pushed up to 30 feet straight away from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Success: Half damage only.

Failure or Success: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

mmCommandingPres.name: Commanding Presence
mmCommandingPres.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses [[/item Spellcasting]] to cast [[/item .mmSpellcasting00.Activity.yT3FKrXFGNmp9LYe]] (level 2 version). The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.
mmCommandingPres.chat: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses Spellcasting to cast Command (level 2 version). The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t take this action again until the start of its next turn.

mmCompression000.name: Compression
mmCompression000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without expending extra movement to do so.

mmConferFireResi.name: Confer Fire Resistance
mmConferFireResi.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can grant Resistance to Fire damage to a rider while it is on the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

mmConjureInferna.name: Conjure Infernal Chain
mmConjureInferna.description:
The devil conjures a fiery chain to bind a creature.

Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=9vCVJrzUZL0ra4w2]], [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=9vCVJrzUZL0ra4w2]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=9vCVJrzUZL0ra4w2]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn, at which point the chain disappears. If the target is Large or smaller, the devil moves the target up to 30 feet straight toward itself.

Success: The chain disappears.

mmConstrict00000.name: Constrict
mmConstrict00000.description:
Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=IgOMjRxAt7UISkJq]], one [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=IgOMjRxAt7UISkJq]] creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=IgOMjRxAt7UISkJq]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. The target has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]), and it has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the grapple ends.

mmCorrosiveForm0.name: Corrosive Form
mmCorrosiveForm0.description:
Nonmagical ammunition is destroyed immediately after hitting the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and dealing any damage. Any nonmagical weapon takes a cumulative −1 penalty to attack rolls immediately after dealing damage to the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and coming into contact with it. The weapon is destroyed if the penalty reaches −5. The penalty can be removed by casting the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMending000]{Mending} spell on the weapon.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can eat through 2-inch-thick, nonmagical metal or wood in 1 round.

Foundry Note

This feature provides an Attack Penalty active effect that will modify a targeted weapon. Since this penalty can be applied multiple times to multiple nonmagical weapons, this active effect needs to be dragged from this item's Effect tab onto the target Item's weapons.

mmCorruptingTouc.name: Corrupting Touch
mmCorruptingTouc.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=F4cByCi1IEouN08a]], [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=F4cByCi1IEouN08a]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=F4cByCi1IEouN08a]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target is cursed for 1 hour. Until the curse ends, the target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] and &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] conditions.

mmCovenMagic0000.name: Coven Magic
mmCovenMagic0000.description: While within 30 feet of at least two hag allies, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can cast one of the following spells, requiring no Material components, using the spell's normal casting time, and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @abilities.int.dc]]): @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplAugury0000]{Augury}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplFindFamili]{Find Familiar}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplIdentify00]{Identify}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplLocateObje]{Locate Object}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplScrying000]{Scrying}, or @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplUnseenServ]{Unseen Servant}. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] must finish a Long Rest before using this trait to cast that spell again.

mmCreateSpecter0.name: Create Specter
mmCreateSpecter0.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] targets a Humanoid corpse within [[lookup @range.value activity=ypIQdXr13u7LATUP]] feet of itself that has been dead for no longer than 1 minute. The target's spirit rises as a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.actors24.Actor.mmSpecter0000000]{Specter} in the space of its corpse or in the nearest unoccupied space. The specter is under the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s control. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can have no more than seven specters under its control at a time.

mmCreateWhirlwin.name: Create Whirlwind
mmCreateWhirlwin.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] conjures a whirlwind at a point it can see within 120 feet. The whirlwind fills a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=TYNKL0QDItFpbR2G]]-foot-radius, [[lookup @target.template.height activity=TYNKL0QDItFpbR2G]]-foot-high [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=TYNKL0QDItFpbR2G]] centered on that point. The whirlwind lasts until the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Concentration on it ends. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can move the whirlwind up to 20 feet at the start of each of its turns.

Whenever the whirlwind enters a creature's space or a creature enters the whirlwind, that creature is subjected to the following effect.

Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=TYNKL0QDItFpbR2G]] (a creature makes this save only once per turn, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is unaffected).

Failure: While in the whirlwind, the target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition and moves with the whirlwind. At the start of each of its turns, the Restrained target takes [[/damage average]] damage. At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the save, ending the effect on itself on a success.

mmCrush000000000.name: Crush
mmCrush000000000.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] attaches to the target. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] had Advantage on the attack roll, it covers the target, which has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition and is &Reference[suffocating apply=false]{suffocating} while the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is attached in this way.

While attached to a target, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can attack only the target but has Advantage on its attack rolls. Its Speed becomes 0, it can't benefit from any bonus to its Speed, and it moves with the target.

A creature can take an action to try to detach the [[lookup @name lowercase]] from itself, doing so with a successful [[/check format=long]]. On its turn, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can detach itself by using 5 feet of movement.

mmCunningAction0.name: Cunning Action
mmCunningAction0.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes the &Reference[Dash apply=false], the &Reference[Disengage apply=false], or &Reference[Hide apply=false] action.

mmCursedTouch000.name: Cursed Touch
mmCursedTouch000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a creature, it is cursed. While cursed, the target gains no benefit from finishing a Short or Long Rest.

mmDeadlyLeap0000.name: Deadly Leap
mmDeadlyLeap0000.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] spends 5 feet of movement to jump to a space within 15 feet that contains one or more Large or smaller creatures.

Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=IPCXEQoTuaAG5l52]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=IPCXEQoTuaAG5l52]] in the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s destination space.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

Success: Half damage, and the target is pushed 5 feet straight away from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

mmDeathBurst0000.name: Death Burst
mmDeathBurst0000.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] explodes [[lookup @activation.condition activity=1SfqWSp7RSyHgG4b]].

mmDissolvingPseu.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. Nonmagical armor worn by the target takes a -1 penalty to the AC it offers. The armor is destroyed if the penalty reduces its AC to 10. The penalty can be removed by casting the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMending000]{Mending} spell on the armor.

mmDivineAwarenes.name: Divine Awareness
mmDivineAwarenes.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] knows if it hears a lie.

Foundry Note

This feature provides an Active Effect to manage Damage Resistances in the character sheet's Effects tab. The resistances outlined will need to be manually enabled/disabled.

mmDragonsBreath0.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=YfxQb5tcONgLb2nD]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=YfxQb5tcONgLb2nD]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=YfxQb5tcONgLb2nD]]-foot Cone.

Success: Half damage.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=kFyuof0SS3nohP0f]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=kFyuof0SS3nohP0f]] Charmed by the [[lookup @name lowercase]] within [[lookup @range.value activity=kFyuof0SS3nohP0f]] feet.

Success: Half damage.

Failure or Success: The target's Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to the damage taken.

mmDrainingSwipe0.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target's Strength score decreases by [[/r 1d4]]. The target dies if this reduces that score to 0. If a Humanoid is slain by this attack, a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.actors24.Actor.mmShadow00000000]{Shadow} rises from the corpse [[/r 1d4]] hours later.

Foundry Note

This feature also provides an Active Effect (AE) to modify the target's Strength Score. When the target roll's their d4 to determine the loss, you can apply the respective AE to the target's sheet.

When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves, the Grappled target moves with it, costing it no extra movement. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can have only one creature Grappled by this action at a time.

mmExaltedRestora.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies outside Mount Celestia, its body disappears, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in Mount Celestia.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the start of its next turn.

Success: The target is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s aura for 24 hours.

mmFiendishRestor.name: Fiendish Restoration
mmFiendishRestor.description: If it dies, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] returns to life in [[/r 1d6]] days and regains all its Hit Points. Only a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplWish000000]{Wish} spell can prevent this trait from functioning.

mmFieryRays00000.name: Fiery Rays

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=U2i9u4ELjeLQfePP]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=U2i9u4ELjeLQfePP]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=U2i9u4ELjeLQfePP]]-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=U2i9u4ELjeLQfePP]] feet.

Success: Half damage.

Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=PyGOI84k0PPYrru8]], any [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=PyGOI84k0PPYrru8]] that starts its turn within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=PyGOI84k0PPYrru8]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] while it is babbling.

5–6. The target takes no action or Bonus Action and uses all its movement to move in a random direction.

7–8. The target makes a melee attack against a randomly determined creature within its reach or does nothing if it can't make such an attack.

Failure: The target is cursed. If the cursed target drops to 0 Hit Points, it instead becomes a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.actors24.Actor.mmWereboar000000]{Wereboar} under the DM's control and has 10 Hit Points.

mmHellishRestora.name: Hellish Restoration

Success: Half damage.

Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=GP5MnIyXCVZ4ZMTQ]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=GP5MnIyXCVZ4ZMTQ]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=GP5MnIyXCVZ4ZMTQ]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Success: The target is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Horror Nimbus for 24 hours.

mmHurlFlame00000.name: Hurl Flame
mmHurlFlame00000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a flammable object that isn't being worn or carried, it starts burning.

mmIceSpear000000.name: Ice Spear
mmIceSpear000000.description:
[[/attack extended]].

Hit: [[/damage average]] damage. Until the end of its next turn, the target can't take a &Reference[Bonus Action] or &Reference[Reaction], its Speed decreases by 10 feet, and it can move or take one action on its turn, not both.

mmIceWalk0000000.name: Ice Walk

mmIceWall0000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplWallofIce0]{Wall of Ice} (level 8 version), requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @abilities.int.dc]]).

mmIgnitedIllumin.name: Ignited Illumination
mmIgnitedIllumin.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] sets itself ablaze or extinguishes its flames. While ablaze, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] sheds Bright Light in a 10-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 10 feet.

mmIllumination00.name: Illumination
mmIllumination00.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] sheds Bright Light in a 20-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 20 feet.

mmIllusoryAppear.name: Illusory Appearance
mmIllusoryAppear.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDisguiseSe]{Disguise Self}, using Constitution as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]). The spell's duration is [[lookup @duration.value activity=qY8e7Xm7QYQDXqsd]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=qY8e7Xm7QYQDXqsd]]s.

mmIncorporealMov.name: Incorporeal Movement
mmIncorporealMov.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can move through other creatures and objects as if they were &Reference[Difficult Terrain]. It takes [[/damage 1d10 average type=force]] damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

mmIncubusForm000.name: Incubus Form
mmIncubusForm000.description: When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] finishes a Long Rest, it can shape-shift into an @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.actors24.Actor.mmIncubus0000000]{Incubus}, using that stat block instead of this one.

mmInfernalGlaive.name: Infernal Glaive
mmInfernalGlaive.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a creature and doesn't already have an infernal wound, it is subjected to the following effect.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=4qy3fKL086OAE1xR]].

Failure: The target receives an infernal wound. While wounded, the target loses [[/damage average activity=IS4utGV80LpDrjvt]] Hit Points at the start of each of its turns. The wound closes after 1 minute, after a spell restores Hit Points to the target, or after the target or a creature within 5 feet of it takes an action to stanch the wound, doing so by succeeding on a [[/check format=long activity=KNWa0TFhANjmQCds]].

mmInfernalSting0.name: Infernal Sting
mmInfernalSting0.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn. While Poisoned, the target can't regain Hit Points.

mmInfernalTail00.name: Infernal Tail
mmInfernalTail00.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=tJYeyUk3iPYJq9xM]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=tJYeyUk3iPYJq9xM]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=tJYeyUk3iPYJq9xM]] [[lookup @range.units activity=tJYeyUk3iPYJq9xM]].

Failure: [[/damage average activity=tJYeyUk3iPYJq9xM]] damage, and the target receives an infernal wound if it doesn't have one. While wounded, the target loses [[/damage average activity=zZfCQ0IeJZCjPLzE]] Hit Points at the start of each of its turns. The wound closes after [[lookup @duration.value activity=tJYeyUk3iPYJq9xM]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=tJYeyUk3iPYJq9xM]], after a spell restores Hit Points to the target, or after the target or a creature within 5 feet of it takes an action to stanch the wound, doing so by succeeding on a [[/check dc=17 ability=wis skill=med format=long]].

mmInkCloud000000.name: Ink Cloud
mmInkCloud000000.description: Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes damage while underwater. Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] releases ink that fills a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=1MiIPcVuCpfgBIkS]]-foot Cube centered on itself, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to its Swim Speed. The Cube is Heavily Obscured for 1 minute or until a strong current or similar effect disperses the ink.

mmInscrutable000.name: Inscrutable
mmInscrutable000.description: No magic can observe the [[lookup @name lowercase]] remotely or detect its thoughts without its permission. Wisdom (Insight) checks made to ascertain its intentions or sincerity are made with Disadvantage.

mmInvisibility00.name: Invisibility
mmInvisibility00.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplInvisibili]{Invisibility} on itself, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability.

mmIronScent00000.name: Iron Scent
mmIronScent00000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can pinpoint the location of [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=I1ppxiVO5CS6tKj0]] within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=I1ppxiVO5CS6tKj0]] feet of itself.

mmJumper00000000.name: Jumper
mmJumper00000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s jump distance is determined using its Dexterity rather than its Strength.

mmLeap0000000000.name: Leap
mmLeap0000000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] jumps up to [[lookup @range.value activity=C28C43DeD8iFtZMe]] feet by [[lookup @activation.condition activity=C28C43DeD8iFtZMe]].

mmLegendaryResis.name: Legendary Resistance
mmLegendaryResis.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

mmLifeDrain00000.name: Life Drain
mmLifeDrain00000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a creature, its Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to the damage taken.

mmLightSensitivi.name: Light Sensitivity
mmLightSensitivi.description: While in Bright Light, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Disadvantage on attack rolls.

mmLightningAbsor.name: Lightning Absorption
mmLightningAbsor.description: Whenever the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is subjected to Lightning damage, it regains a number of Hit Points equal to the Lightning damage dealt.

mmLightningBlade.name: Lightning Blade
mmLightningBlade.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target can't take &Reference[Reaction] until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

mmLightningBreat.name: Lightning Breath
mmLightningBreat.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=LpjgVwftzGNMgTUJ]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=LpjgVwftzGNMgTUJ]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=LpjgVwftzGNMgTUJ]]-foot-long, [[lookup @target.template.width activity=LpjgVwftzGNMgTUJ]]-foot-wide [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=LpjgVwftzGNMgTUJ]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

mmLightningStorm.name: Lightning Storm
mmLightningStorm.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=YVri6iuieFUUiO1d]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=YVri6iuieFUUiO1d]]-foot-radius, [[lookup @target.template.height activity=YVri6iuieFUUiO1d]]-feet-high Cylinder originating from a point the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=YVri6iuieFUUiO1d]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

mmLightningStrik.name: Lightning Strike
mmLightningStrik.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=v39JwGqgfaKiA4vc]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=v39JwGqgfaKiA4vc]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=v39JwGqgfaKiA4vc]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

mmLimitedAmphibi.name: Limited Amphibiousness
mmLimitedAmphibi.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can breathe air and water, but it must be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating outside water.

mmLoathsomeLimbs.name: Loathsome Limbs
mmLoathsomeLimbs.description:
If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] ends any turn Bloodied and took 15+ Slashing damage during that turn, one of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]l's limbs is severed, falls into the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s space, and becomes a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.actors24.Actor.mmTrollLimb00000]{Troll Limb}. The limb acts immediately after the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s turn. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has 1 &Reference[Exhaustion apply=false] level for each missing limb, and it grows replacement limbs the next time it regains Hit Points.

Foundry Note

This feature provides an Active Effect condition in the character sheet's Effects tab to enable each level of Exhaustion. Since the condition can be applied multiple times, the GM must manually manage the level of Exhaustion. There is an active effect available for each level of exhaustion.

mmLuringSong0000.name: Luring Song
mmLuringSong0000.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] sings a magical melody, which lasts until the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Concentration ends on it.

Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=dxxqZP7Vo01te3QB]], each [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=dxxqZP7Vo01te3QB]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dxxqZP7Vo01te3QB]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] when the song starts.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition until the song ends and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns. While Charmed, the target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition and ignores the Luring Song of other harpies.

If the target is more than 5 feet from the [[lookup @name lowercase]], the target moves on its turn toward the [[lookup @name lowercase]] by the most direct route, trying to get within 5 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. It doesn't avoid &Reference[OpportunityAttacks]; however, before moving into damaging terrain (such as lava or a pit) and whenever it takes damage from a source other than the [[lookup @name lowercase]], the target repeats the save.

Success: The target is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Luring Song for 24 hours.

mmMagicOfTheSpid.name: Magic of the Spider Queen
mmMagicOfTheSpid.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDarkness00]{Darkness}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplFaerieFire]{Faerie Fire}, or @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplWeb0000000]{Web}, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]).

mmMagicResistanc.name: Magic Resistance
mmMagicResistanc.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

mmMagicRope00000.name: Magic Rope
mmMagicRope00000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has a magic rope. While bearing it, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can use the [[/item .mmEntanglingRope]] action. The rope has AC 20, HP 90, and Immunity to Poison and Psychic damage. The rope turns to dust if reduced to 0 Hit Points, if it is 5+ feet away from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] for 1 hour or more, or if the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies. If the rope is damaged or destroyed, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can fully restore it when finishing a Short or Long Rest.

mmMimicry0000000.name: Mimicry
mmMimicry0000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can mimic simple sounds it has heard, such as a whisper or chitter. A hearer can discern the sounds are imitations with a successful [[/check format=long]].

mmMindInvasion00.name: Mind Invasion
mmMindInvasion00.description: The dragon uses [[/item Spellcasting]] to cast [[/item .mmSpellcasting00.Activity.hHQiQYfo3AV5ZW6F]] (level 3 version).

mmMindJolt000000.name: Mind Jolt
mmMindJolt000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses [[/item Spellcasting]] to cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMindSpike0]{Mind Spike} (level 5 version). The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

mmMindrendingRoa.name: Mind-Rending Roar
mmMindrendingRoa.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=zPMfwwIoTFzIrN5H]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=zPMfwwIoTFzIrN5H]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=zPMfwwIoTFzIrN5H]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

mmMistyEscape000.name: Misty Escape
mmMistyEscape000.description:
If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] drops to 0 Hit Points outside its resting place, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses Shape-Shift to become mist (no action required). If it can't use Shape-Shift, it is destroyed.

While it has 0 Hit Points in mist form, it can't return to its vampire form, and it must reach its resting place within 2 hours or be destroyed. Once in its resting place, it returns to its vampire form and has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition until it regains any Hit Points, and it regains 1 Hit Point after spending 1 hour there.

mmMistyStep00000.name: Misty Step
mmMistyStep00000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMistyStep0]{Misty Step}, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

mmMoan0000000000.name: Moan
mmMoan0000000000.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Mng39fcFDc4I1AzY]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=Mng39fcFDc4I1AzY]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=Mng39fcFDc4I1AzY]]-[[lookup @target.template.units activity=Mng39fcFDc4I1AzY]]. Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

Success: The target is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Moan for the next 24 hours.

mmMockery0000000.name: Mockery
mmMockery0000000.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=s5CMus4LOXBkt1Wn]], [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=s5CMus4LOXBkt1Wn]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=s5CMus4LOXBkt1Wn]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

mmMucusCloud0000.name: Mucus Cloud
mmMucusCloud0000.description:
While underwater, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is surrounded by mucus.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC 14, each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=clFFG8uDBSFzxIo8]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=clFFG8uDBSFzxIo8]]-[[lookup @target.template.units activity=clFFG8uDBSFzxIo8]] Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] at the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s turn.

Failure: The target is cursed. Until the curse ends, the target's skin becomes slimy, the target can breathe air and water, and it can't regain Hit Points unless it is underwater.

While the cursed creature is outside a body of water, the creature takes [[/damage average activity=JrxCVyCOsBAMVZS7]] damage at the end of every 10 minutes unless moisture is applied to its skin before those minutes have passed.

mmMultipleHeads0.name: Multiple Heads
mmMultipleHeads0.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has five heads. Whenever the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes 25 damage or more on a single turn, one of its heads dies. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies if all its heads are dead. At the end of each of its turns when it has at least one living head, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] grows two heads for each of its heads that died since its last turn, unless it has taken Fire damage since its last turn. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains 20 Hit Points when it grows new heads.

mmNightmare00000.name: Nightmare
mmNightmare00000.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Y9H9ImnMcffBZlH3]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=Y9H9ImnMcffBZlH3]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=Y9H9ImnMcffBZlH3]] feet.

Failure: If the target has 20 Hit Points or fewer, it has the &Reference[Unconscious apply=false] condition for [[lookup @duration.value activity=Y9H9ImnMcffBZlH3]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=Y9H9ImnMcffBZlH3]], until it takes damage, or until a creature within 5 feet of it takes an action to wake it. Otherwise, the target takes [[/damage average]] damage.

mmNightmareHaunt.name: Nightmare Haunting
mmNightmareHaunt.description:
While on the Ethereal Plane, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDream00000]{Dream}, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting. Only the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can serve as the spell's messenger, and the target must be a [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=4GGGVhvLSrHgHdb9]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=4GGGVhvLSrHgHdb9]]. The spell fails and is wasted if the target is under the effect of the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbEvilAndGoodPr]{Protection from Evil and Good} spell or within a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMagicCircl]{Magic Circle} spell.

If the target takes damage from the Dream spell, the target's Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to that damage. If the spell kills the target, its soul is trapped in the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s soul bag, and the target can't be raised from the dead until its soul is released.

mmNightmareRay00.name: Nightmare Ray
mmNightmareRay00.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

mmNimbleEscape00.name: Nimble Escape
mmNimbleEscape00.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes the &Reference[Disengage] or &Reference[Hide] action.

mmNoxiousMiasma0.name: Noxious Miasma
mmNoxiousMiasma0.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Blm8nddvCOH69bL8]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=Blm8nddvCOH69bL8]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=Blm8nddvCOH69bL8]]-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=Blm8nddvCOH69bL8]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target takes a −2 penalty to AC until the end of its next turn.

Failure or Success: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

mmOceanSpear0000.name: Ocean Spear
mmOceanSpear0000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a creature, its Speed decreases by 10 feet until the end of its next turn. Hit or Miss: The spear magically returns to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s hand immediately after a ranged attack.

mmOnslaught00000.name: Onslaught
mmOnslaught00000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to half its Speed, and it makes one [[/item .mmClaw0000000000]] or [[/item .mmTail0000000000]] attack.

mmOozeCube000000.name: Ooze Cube
mmOozeCube000000.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] fills its entire space and is transparent. Other creatures can enter that space, but a creature that does so is subjected to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Engulf and has Disadvantage on the saving throw.

Creatures inside the [[lookup @name lowercase]] have &Reference[Total Cover], and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can hold one Large creature or up to four Medium or Small creatures inside itself at a time.

As an action, a creature within [[lookup @range.value activity=EcTOfXWsDJRHLydy]] [[lookup @range.units activity=EcTOfXWsDJRHLydy]]. of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can pull a creature or an object out of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] by succeeding on a [[/check dc=12 ability=str skill=ath format=long]], and the puller takes [[/damage average activity=PMCvyqxfUYiPzNK8]] damage.

mmPackTactics000.name: Pack Tactics
mmPackTactics000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.

mmParalyzingBrea.name: Paralyzing Breath
mmParalyzingBrea.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=r4MGqEq5U9aaseBh]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=r4MGqEq5U9aaseBh]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=r4MGqEq5U9aaseBh]]-foot Cone.

First Failure: The target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn, when it repeats the save.

Second Failure: The target has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition, and it repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

mmParalyzingTent.name: Paralyzing Tentacles
mmParalyzingTent.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=p157Iqz8s0M0VilW]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=p157Iqz8s0M0VilW]] Grappled by the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically. While Poisoned, the target has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition.

mmParry000000000.name: Parry
mmParry000000000.description: Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is [[lookup @activation.condition activity=aLG3BRZL7P6OEjwd]]. Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] adds [[lookup @roll.formula activity=aLG3BRZL7P6OEjwd]] to its AC against that attack, possibly causing it to miss.

mmPetrifyingBite.name: Petrifying Bite
mmPetrifyingBite.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a creature, it is subjected to the following effect.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=udF9lrpAQMvL0b9J]].

First Failure: The target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of its next turn if it is still Restrained, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Second Failure: The target has the &Reference[Petrified apply=false] condition instead of the Restrained condition.

mmPetrifyingBrea.name: Petrifying Breath
mmPetrifyingBrea.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=reU3RXAk0MdPmKCl]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=reU3RXAk0MdPmKCl]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=reU3RXAk0MdPmKCl]]-foot Cone.

First Failure: The target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of its next turn if it is still Restrained, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Second Failure: The target has the &Reference[Petrified apply=false] condition instead of the Restrained condition.

mmPetrifyingGaze.name: Petrifying Gaze
mmPetrifyingGaze.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=mN9aF1WkHQWLIN4B]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=mN9aF1WkHQWLIN4B]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=mN9aF1WkHQWLIN4B]]-foot [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=mN9aF1WkHQWLIN4B]].
