If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] sees its reflection in the [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=mN9aF1WkHQWLIN4B]], the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must make this save.

First Failure: The target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of its next turn if it is still Restrained, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Second Failure: The target has the &Reference[Petrified apply=false] condition instead of the Restrained condition.

mmPhantasms00000.name: Phantasms
mmPhantasms00000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMirrorImag]{Mirror Image} spell, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability. The spell ends early if the [[lookup @name lowercase]] starts or ends its turn in Bright Light.

mmPincer00000000.name: Pincer
mmPincer00000000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]) from one of two pincers.

mmPoisonBreath00.name: Poison Breath
mmPoisonBreath00.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=lnabW9bM51HoluPp]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=lnabW9bM51HoluPp]]-foot [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=lnabW9bM51HoluPp]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

mmPoisonousSpitt.name: Poisonous Spittle
mmPoisonousSpitt.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=r4plP8QiJxzFZZO7]], [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=r4plP8QiJxzFZZO7]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=r4plP8QiJxzFZZO7]] feet.

Failure: 31 (7d8) Poison damage, and the target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

Success: Half damage only.

mmPounce00000000.name: Pounce
mmPounce00000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to half its Speed, and it makes one [[/item Rend]] attack.

mmProbingTelepat.name: Probing Telepathy
mmProbingTelepat.description: If a creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see communicates telepathically with the [[lookup @name lowercase]], the [[lookup @name lowercase]] learns the creature's greatest desires.

mmProboscis00000.name: Proboscis
mmProboscis00000.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a creature, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] attaches to the target. While attached, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't make Proboscis attacks, and the target takes [[/damage average activity=5xwoPMBiaRBqjFav]] damage at the start of each of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s turns.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can detach itself by spending 5 feet of its movement. The target or a creature within 5 feet of it can detach the [[lookup @name lowercase]] as an action.

mmProtection0000.name: Protection
mmProtection0000.description:
Trigger: An attack roll hits the wearer of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s amulet while the wearer is within 5 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Response: The wearer gains a +5 bonus to AC, including against the triggering attack and possibly causing it to miss, until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

mmProtectiveMagi.name: Protective Magic
mmProtectiveMagi.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplCounterspe]{Counterspell} or @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplShield0000]{Shield} in response to the spell's trigger, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

mmPummel00000000.name: Pummel
mmPummel00000000.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=aae828c0Hue0XOMP]], one creature Grappled by the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

mmPursuit0000000.name: Pursuit
mmPursuit0000000.description: Trigger: Another creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see ends its move within [[lookup @range.value activity=blUXkjLhs9kD2ofo]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses Teleport, but its destination space must be [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=blUXkjLhs9kD2ofo]].

mmQuickGrapple00.name: Quick Grapple
mmQuickGrapple00.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=aDWVHpJgsNPPNrDs]], [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=aDWVHpJgsNPPNrDs]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=aDWVHpJgsNPPNrDs]] [[lookup @target.template.units activity=aDWVHpJgsNPPNrDs]].

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Grappled] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]).

mmRadiantTelepor.name: Radiant Teleport
mmRadiantTelepor.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] teleports up to [[lookup @range.value activity=HtsFBK1PYKjvy9mn]] feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=HtsFBK1PYKjvy9mn]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=HtsFBK1PYKjvy9mn]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] at its destination space.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

mmRam00000000000.name: Ram
mmRam00000000000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], or [[/damage average activity=kJRbpcMr4MaYs4JL]] damage if the goat moved 20+ feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit.

mmRampage0000000.name: Rampage
mmRampage0000000.description: Immediately after dealing damage to a creature that is already &Reference[Bloodied], the [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to half its Speed, and it makes one [[/item .mmBite0000000000]] attack.

mmReactive000000.name: Reactive
mmReactive000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can take one &Reference[Reaction] on every turn of combat.

mmReactiveHeads0.name: Reactive Heads
mmReactiveHeads0.description: For each head the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has beyond one, it gets an extra &Reference[Reaction] that can be used only for &Reference[OpportunityAttacks].

mmReadThoughts00.name: Read Thoughts
mmReadThoughts00.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDetectThou]{Detect Thoughts}, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @abilities.cha.dc]]).

mmRedirectAttack.name: Redirect Attack
mmRedirectAttack.description:
Trigger: A creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see makes an attack roll against it.

Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] chooses [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=pIlCmuPw8YUqAISY]] within [[lookup @range.value activity=pIlCmuPw8YUqAISY]] feet of itself. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] and that [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=pIlCmuPw8YUqAISY]] swap places, and the [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=pIlCmuPw8YUqAISY]] becomes the target of the attack instead.

mmReel0000000000.name: Reel
mmReel0000000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] pulls each creature Grappled by it up to 30 feet straight toward it.

mmReflectiveCara.name: Reflective Carapace
mmReflectiveCara.description:
If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is targeted by a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMagicMissi]{Magic Missile} spell or a spell that requires a ranged attack roll, roll [[/r 1d6]].

On a 1–5, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is unaffected.

On a 6, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is unaffected and reflects the spell, turning the caster into the target.

mmReflexiveAnten.name: Reflexive Antennae
mmReflexiveAnten.description: Trigger: An attack roll hits the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses [[/item .mmAntennae000000]].

mmRegeneration00.name: Regeneration
mmRegeneration00.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains [[lookup @healing.formula activity=5cGvjZJIJVicjJ3d]] Hit Points at the start of each of its turns if it has at least 1 Hit Point.

mmRepulsionBreat.name: Repulsion Breath
mmRepulsionBreat.description:
Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=zuf9EEVj4nI1joaH]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=zuf9EEVj4nI1joaH]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=zuf9EEVj4nI1joaH]]-foot Cone.

Failure: The target is pushed up to 40 feet straight away from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

mmRestlessTouch0.name: Restless Touch
mmRestlessTouch0.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target is cursed for 24 hours or until the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies. Until the curse ends, the target gains no benefit from finishing Short Rests.

mmRiposte0000000.name: Riposte
mmRiposte0000000.description:
Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is hit by a melee attack roll while holding a weapon.

Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] adds 3 to its AC against that attack, possibly causing it to miss. On a miss, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one Rapier attack against the triggering creature if within range.

Foundry Note

This feature also provides an Active Effect (AE) that will modify this creature's Armor Class when you utilize the reaction. You can enable the AE in the effects tab of the character sheet.

mmRoar0000000000.name: Roar
mmRoar0000000000.description:
The sphinx emits a magical roar. Whenever it roars, the roar has a different effect, as detailed below (the sequence resets when it takes a Long Rest):

First Roar.

Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Igeu89TALGlNPXDg]], each enemy in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=Igeu89TALGlNPXDg]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition for [[lookup @duration.value activity=Igeu89TALGlNPXDg]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=Igeu89TALGlNPXDg]].

Second Roar.

Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=uFTndQPvULZVHT9R]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=uFTndQPvULZVHT9R]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=uFTndQPvULZVHT9R]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition, and it repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After [[lookup @duration.value activity=uFTndQPvULZVHT9R]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=uFTndQPvULZVHT9R]], it succeeds automatically.

Third Roar.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Td8ArIMDfxWDLbE9]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=Td8ArIMDfxWDLbE9]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=Td8ArIMDfxWDLbE9]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

Success: [[lookup @damage.onSave capitalize activity=Td8ArIMDfxWDLbE9]] damage only.

mmRockLaunch0000.name: Rock Launch
mmRockLaunch0000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

mmRottingFist000.name: Rotting Fist
mmRottingFist000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a creature, it is cursed. While cursed, the target can't regain Hit Points, its Hit Point maximum doesn't return to normal when finishing a Long Rest, and its Hit Point maximum decreases by [[/r 3d6#HP Max Decrease]]{10 (3d6)} every 24 hours that elapse. A creature dies and turns to dust if reduced to 0 Hit Points by this attack.

mmRottingGaze000.name: Rotting Gaze
mmRottingGaze000.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=k4jetEkSCPApNFgz]], [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=k4jetEkSCPApNFgz]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=k4jetEkSCPApNFgz]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

mmRunningLeap000.name: Running Leap
mmRunningLeap000.description: With a 10-foot running start, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can Long Jump up to 25 feet.

mmScare000000000.name: Scare
mmScare000000000.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=L6pjs2RafI3pF8b3]], one creature within [[lookup @range.value activity=L6pjs2RafI3pF8b3]] feet.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition. At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the save, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

mmScorchingSands.name: Scorching Sands
mmScorchingSands.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=g5fxAWhrpwohtETl]], [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=g5fxAWhrpwohtETl]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=g5fxAWhrpwohtETl]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target's Speed is halved until the end of its next turn.

Failure or Success: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

mmSenseMagic0000.name: Sense Magic
mmSenseMagic0000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] senses magic within 120 feet of itself. This trait otherwise works like the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDetectMagi]{Detect Magic} spell but isn't itself magical.

mmShadowStealth0.name: Shadow Stealth
mmShadowStealth0.description: While in Dim Light or Darkness, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes the &Reference[Hide] action.

mmShapeshift0000.name: Shape-Shift
mmShapeshift0000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] shape-shifts into a Large wolf-humanoid hybrid form or a Medium wolf, or it returns to its true humanoid form, or it returns to its true form. Its game statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

mmSharkTelepathy.name: Shark Telepathy
mmSharkTelepathy.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can magically control sharks within 120 feet of itself, using a special telepathy.

mmShieldBash0000.name: Shield Bash
mmShieldBash0000.description:
Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=eIErvLccVVCXiCSl]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=eIErvLccVVCXiCSl]] within [[lookup @range.value activity=eIErvLccVVCXiCSl]] [[lookup @range.units activity=eIErvLccVVCXiCSl]]. that the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

mmShieldedMind00.name: Shielded Mind
mmShieldedMind00.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s thoughts can't be read by any means, and other creatures can communicate with it telepathically only if it allows them.

mmShimmeringShie.name: Shimmering Shield
mmShimmeringShie.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] targets itself or one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=sl8NoPhB0e5z6jmK]] it can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=sl8NoPhB0e5z6jmK]] feet of itself. The target gains [[/healing average temp]], and its AC increases by 2 until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s' next turn. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

mmShriek00000000.name: Shriek
mmShriek00000000.description: Trigger: A [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=Tlv3gcYk5KfdtV7c]] or a source of Bright Light moves within [[lookup @range.value activity=Tlv3gcYk5KfdtV7c]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] emits a shriek audible within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=Tlv3gcYk5KfdtV7c]] feet of itself for [[lookup @duration.value activity=Tlv3gcYk5KfdtV7c]] minute or until the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies.

mmSiegeMonster00.name: Siege Monster
mmSiegeMonster00.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] deals double damage to objects and structures.

mmSlayingBow0000.name: Slaying Bow
mmSlayingBow0000.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=C7BMf8hIfCjxRSWC]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=C7BMf8hIfCjxRSWC]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=C7BMf8hIfCjxRSWC]] [[lookup @range.units activity=C7BMf8hIfCjxRSWC]].

Failure: If the [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=C7BMf8hIfCjxRSWC]] has 100 Hit Points or fewer, it dies. It otherwise takes [[/damage average]] damage.

mmSleep000000000.name: Sleep
mmSleep000000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplSleep00000] spell, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]).

mmSleepBreath000.name: Sleep Breath
mmSleepBreath000.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=6ce9oevQRWomSVSF]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=6ce9oevQRWomSVSF]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=6ce9oevQRWomSVSF]]-foot Cone.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn, at which point it repeats the save.

Second Failure: The target has the &Reference[Unconscious apply=false] condition for [[lookup @duration.value activity=EZma0lCmQeTuVuAL]] minute. This effect ends for the target if it takes damage or a creature within 5 feet of it takes an action to wake it.

mmSlow0000000000.name: Slow
mmSlow0000000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplSlow000000]{Slow} spell, requiring no spell components and using Constitution as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]).

mmSlowingBreath0.name: Slowing Breath
mmSlowingBreath0.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=teMMQNDDIE9XkPN3]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=teMMQNDDIE9XkPN3]]-foot Cone.

Failure: The target can't take Reactions; its Speed is halved; and it can take either an action or a Bonus Action on its turn, not both. This effect lasts until the end of its next turn.

mmSmother0000000.name: Smother
mmSmother0000000.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can give it the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]) instead of dealing damage. Until the grapple ends, the target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] and &Reference[Restrained apply=false] conditions, is &Reference[Suffocating]{suffocating}, and takes [[/damage average]] damage at the start of each of its turns. [[lookup @name lowercase]] rug can smother only one creature at a time.

While grappling the target, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't take this action, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] halves the damage it takes (round down), and the target takes the same amount of damage.

mmSonicBoom00000.name: Sonic Boom
mmSonicBoom00000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses Spellcasting to cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplShatter000]{Shatter} (level 3 version). The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

mmSoulBag0000000.name: Soul Bag
mmSoulBag0000000.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has a soul bag. While holding or carrying the bag, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can use its Nightmare Haunting action.

The bag has AC 15, HP 20, and Resistance to all damage. The bag turns to dust if reduced to 0 Hit Points. If the bag is destroyed, any souls the bag is holding are released. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can create a new bag after 7 days.

mmSpeakWithBeast.name: Speak with Beasts and Plants
mmSpeakWithBeast.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can communicate with Beasts and Plants as if they shared a language.

mmSpeakWithFrogs.name: Speak with Frogs and Toads
mmSpeakWithFrogs.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can communicate simple concepts to frogs and toads when it speaks in Bullywug.

mmSpellStoring00.name: Spell Storing
mmSpellStoring00.description: A spellcaster who wears the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s amulet can cause the [[lookup @name lowercase]] to store one spell of level 4 or lower. To do so, the wearer must cast the spell on the [[lookup @name lowercase]] while within 5 feet of it. The spell has no effect but is stored within the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Any previously stored spell is lost when a new spell is stored. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can cast the spell stored with any parameters set by the original caster, requiring no spell components and using the caster's spellcasting ability. The stored spell is then lost.

mmSpellcasting00.name: Spellcasting
mmSpellcasting00.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDetectEvil]{Detect Evil and Good}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDruidcraft]{Druidcraft}

1/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplCalmEmotio]{Calm Emotions}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDispelEvil]{Dispel Evil and Good}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplEntangle00]{Entangle}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplPasswithou]{Pass without Trace}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplWordofReca]{Word of Recall}

mmSpiderClimb000.name: Spider Climb
mmSpiderClimb000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

mmSpiritJar00000.name: Spirit Jar
mmSpiritJar00000.description: If destroyed, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] reforms in [[/r 1d10]] days if it has a spirit jar, reviving with all its Hit Points. The new body appears in an unoccupied space within the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s lair.

mmSpiritualWeapo.name: Spiritual Weapon
mmSpiritualWeapo.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplSpiritualW]{Spiritual Weapon} spell, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

mmSplit000000000.name: Split
mmSplit000000000.description:
Trigger: While the [[lookup @name lowercase]] [[lookup @activation.condition activity=zoXFSgzmWq8frUjI]]

Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] splits into two new [[lookup @name capitalize]]. Each new [[lookup @name lowercase]] is one size smaller than the original [[lookup @name lowercase]] and acts on its Initiative. The original [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Hit Points are divided evenly between the new [[lookup @name lowercase]]s (round down).

mmSpores00000000.name: Spores
mmSpores00000000.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=voqQeTnihpy3BTFf]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=voqQeTnihpy3BTFf]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. While Poisoned, the target takes [[/damage average activity=ukZveNVmvvtwbDj0]] at the start of each of its turns. Emptying a flask of Holy Water on the target ends the effect early.

mmStandingLeap00.name: Standing Leap
mmStandingLeap00.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Long Jump is up to 20 feet and its High Jump is up to 10 feet with or without a running start.

mmSteamBreath000.name: Steam Breath
mmSteamBreath000.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=5iI1KQRWrdMGh9sy]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=5iI1KQRWrdMGh9sy]]-foot Cone.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target's Speed decreases by 10 feet until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] next turn..

Success: Half damage.

Failure or Success: Being underwater doesn't grant Resistance to this Fire damage.

mmStench00000000.name: Stench
mmStench00000000.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=mJbwhj3beOIB3Jgj]], any creature (other than a [[lookup @name lowercase]]) that starts its turn in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=mJbwhj3beOIB3Jgj]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the start of its next turn.

Success: The target is immune to the Stench of all [[lookup @name lowercase]] for 1 hour.

mmSting000000000.name: Sting
mmSting000000000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the start of the wyvern's next turn.

mmStunningScreec.name: Stunning Screech
mmStunningScreec.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=eoIikvnPayaj02oN]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=eoIikvnPayaj02oN]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] (demons succeed automatically).

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Stunned apply=false] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

mmSuccubusForm00.name: Succubus Form
mmSuccubusForm00.description: When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] finishes a Long Rest, it can shape-shift into a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.actors24.Actor.mmSuccubus000000]{Succubus}, using that stat block instead of this one. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

mmSunlightSensit.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
mmSunlightSensit.description: While in sunlight, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls.

mmSunlightWeakne.name: Sunlight Weakness
mmSunlightWeakne.description: While in sunlight, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Disadvantage on D20 Tests.

mmSwallow0000000.name: Swallow
mmSwallow0000000.description:
Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=YorssyWMumAsvzx3]], [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=YorssyWMumAsvzx3]] by the [[lookup @name lowercase]] (it can have up to six creatures swallowed at a time).

Failure: The target is swallowed, and the Grappled condition ends. A swallowed creature has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] and &Reference[Restrained apply=false] conditions and can't teleport, it has &Reference[Total Cover] against attacks and other effects outside the [[lookup @name lowercase]], and takes [[/damage average activity=zrWNjO9mkbN28spL]] damage at the start of each of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s turns.

If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes 60 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must succeed on a [[/save format=long activity=rGeGukkm2t2fXsoy]] at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, each of which falls in a space within [[lookup @range.value activity=rGeGukkm2t2fXsoy]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition. If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies, any swallowed creature no longer has the Restrained condition and can escape from the corpse by using 20 feet of movement, exiting Prone.

mmSwarm000000000.name: Swarm
mmSwarm000000000.description: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny snake. The swarm can't regain Hit Points or gain Temporary Hit Points.

mmSwarmOfGraspin.name: Swarm of Grasping Hands
mmSwarmOfGraspin.description: [[/attack extended activity=rO8NirkWF6w9GXTc]]. [[/damage average extended activity=rO8NirkWF6w9GXTc]], or [[/damage average activity=hzeHzcSKHC4AvIJQ]] damage if [[lookup @activation.condition activity=hzeHzcSKHC4AvIJQ]]. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

mmSwoop000000000.name: Swoop
mmSwoop000000000.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has a creature Grappled, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] flies up to half its Fly Speed without provoking &Reference[OpportunityAttacks] and drops that creature.

mmTail0000000000.name: Tail
mmTail0000000000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

mmTailSwipe00000.name: Tail Swipe
mmTailSwipe00000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one [[/item Rend]] attack.

mmTalons00000000.name: Talons
mmTalons00000000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=xdrDC5kFs6sCOFiE]] creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]) from both talons, and it has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the grapple ends.

mmTelepathicBond.name: Telepathic Bond
mmTelepathicBond.description: While the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is on the same plane of existence as its master, the two of them can communicate telepathically with each other.

mmTeleport000000.name: Teleport
mmTeleport000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] teleports up to [[lookup @range.value activity=dnoRMdFzhUUku26D]] feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

mmTentacle000000.name: Tentacle
mmTentacle000000.description:
[[/attack extended]]. Hit: The target has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]) from one of six tentacles, and the target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the grapple ends.

The tentacle can be damaged, freeing a creature it has Grappled when destroyed (AC 20, HP 10, Immunity to Poison and Psychic damage). Damaging the tentacle deals no damage to the [[lookup @name lowercase]], and a destroyed tentacle regrows at the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

mmTentacleSlam00.name: Tentacle Slam
mmTentacleSlam00.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=VC2iSwNPNaZ7M2bT]], [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=VC2iSwNPNaZ7M2bT]] by the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Stunned apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

Success: Half damage only.

mmTentacles00000.name: Tentacles
mmTentacles00000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]) from all four tentacles.

mmThunderbolt000.name: Thunderbolt
mmThunderbolt000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] and &Reference[Deafened apply=false] conditions until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

mmThunderclap000.name: Thunderclap
mmThunderclap000.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Lq6GexegvlEVB6Dh]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=Lq6GexegvlEVB6Dh]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=Lq6GexegvlEVB6Dh]]-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=Lq6GexegvlEVB6Dh]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Deafened apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn.

mmThundercloud00.name: Thundercloud
mmThundercloud00.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn.

mmThunderousBell.name: Thunderous Bellow
mmThunderousBell.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=RWBqtTjGSlEgQWCl]], [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=RWBqtTjGSlEgQWCl]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=RWBqtTjGSlEgQWCl]]-[[lookup @target.template.units activity=RWBqtTjGSlEgQWCl]]. [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=RWBqtTjGSlEgQWCl]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Deafened apply=false] and &Reference[Frightened apply=false] conditions until the end of its next turn.

Success: Half damage only.

mmTouch000000000.name: Touch
mmTouch000000000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a creature or a flammable object that isn't being worn or carried, it starts burning.

mmToxicInk000000.name: Toxic Ink
mmToxicInk000000.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Kquf9zADg0jtKBqw]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=Kquf9zADg0jtKBqw]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=Kquf9zADg0jtKBqw]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] while it is underwater.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] and &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] conditions until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] then moves up to its Speed.

Failure or Success: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

mmTraining000000.name: Training
mmTraining000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has proficiency in one skill of the DM's choice and has Advantage whenever it makes an ability check using that skill.

mmTrample0000000.name: Trample
mmTrample0000000.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=QckCIpsC3BdEHycI]], [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=QckCIpsC3BdEHycI]] within [[lookup @range.value activity=QckCIpsC3BdEHycI]] feet that has the Prone condition.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

mmTramplingCharg.name: Trampling Charge
mmTramplingCharg.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to its Speed without provoking &Reference[OpportunityAttacks] and can move through the spaces of [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=FG9rAj3Q8UTxbGLF]]. Each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=FG9rAj3Q8UTxbGLF]] whose space the [[lookup @name lowercase]] enters is targeted once by the following effect.

Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=FG9rAj3Q8UTxbGLF]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

mmTransparent000.name: Transparent
mmTransparent000.description: Even when the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is in plain sight, a creature must succeed on a [[/check dc=15 ability=wis skill=prc format=long]] to notice the [[lookup @name lowercase]] if the creature hasn't witnessed the [[lookup @name lowercase]] move or otherwise act.

mmTrashLob000000.name: Trash Lob
mmTrashLob000000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn.

mmTreasureSense0.name: Treasure Sense
mmTreasureSense0.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can pinpoint the location of precious metals and stones within 60 feet of itself.

mmTreeClub000000.name: Tree Club
mmTreeClub000000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

mmTreeStride0000.name: Tree Stride
mmTreeStride0000.description: If within [[lookup @range.value activity=8av8Lh1jNLCrOJny]] feet of a [[lookup @range.special activity=8av8Lh1jNLCrOJny]], the [[lookup @name lowercase]] teleports to an unoccupied space within [[lookup @range.value activity=8av8Lh1jNLCrOJny]] feet of a second [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=8av8Lh1jNLCrOJny]] that is within 60 feet of the previous tree.

mmTrollSpawn0000.name: Troll Spawn
mmTrollSpawn0000.description: The limb uncannily has the same senses as a whole [[lookup @name lowercase]]. If the limb isn't destroyed within 24 hours, roll [[/r 1d12#On a 12, the limb turns into a troll]]{roll 1d12}. On a 12, the limb turns into a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.actors24.Actor.mmTroll000000000]{Troll}. Otherwise, the limb withers away.

mmTunneler000000.name: Tunneler
mmTunneler000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can burrow through solid rock at half its Burrow Speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

mmTusk0000000000.name: Tusk (Boar or Hybrid Form Only)
mmTusk0000000000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] moved 20+ feet straight toward it immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) damage and has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

mmUmbralDagger00.name: Umbral Dagger
mmUmbralDagger00.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is reduced to 0 Hit Points by this attack, the target becomes Stable but has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition for 1 hour. While it has the Poisoned condition, the target has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition.

mmUndeadFortitud.name: Undead Fortitude
mmUndeadFortitud.description: If damage reduces the [[lookup @name lowercase]] to 0 Hit Points, it makes a Constitution saving throw (DC 5 plus the damage taken) unless the damage is Radiant or from a Critical Hit. On a successful save, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] drops to 1 Hit Point instead.

mmUndeadRestorat.name: Undead Restoration
mmUndeadRestorat.description: If destroyed, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] gains a new body in 24 hours if its heart is intact, reviving with all its Hit Points. The new body appears in an unoccupied space within the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s lair. The heart is a Tiny object that has AC 17, HP 10, and Immunity to all damage except Fire.

mmUnnervingGaze0.name: Unnerving Gaze
mmUnnervingGaze0.description:
Trigger: A [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=btp6NZvx465nxWTF]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see starts its turn within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=btp6NZvx465nxWTF]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and can see the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Response—Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=btp6NZvx465nxWTF]], the triggering [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=btp6NZvx465nxWTF]].

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the end of its turn.

Success: The target is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Unnerving Gaze for 24 hours.

mmUnsettlingVisa.name: Unsettling Visage
mmUnsettlingVisa.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=USxIbGZPLvfPnnoI]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=USxIbGZPLvfPnnoI]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=USxIbGZPLvfPnnoI]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] that can see the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After [[lookup @duration.value activity=USxIbGZPLvfPnnoI]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=USxIbGZPLvfPnnoI]], it succeeds automatically.

mmVampireWeaknes.name: Vampire Weakness
mmVampireWeaknes.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has these weaknesses:

Forbiddance. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't enter a residence without an invitation from an occupant.

Running Water. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes 20 Acid damage if it ends its turn in running water.

Stake to the Heart. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is destroyed if a weapon that deals Piercing damage is driven into the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s heart while the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has the Incapacitated condition.

Sunlight. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes 20 Radiant damage if it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

mmVampiricConnec.name: Vampiric Connection
mmVampiricConnec.description: While the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and its vampire master are on the same plane of existence, the vampire can communicate with the [[lookup @name lowercase]] telepathically, and the vampire can perceive through the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s senses.

mmVanish00000000.name: Vanish
mmVanish00000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] and its light have the &Reference[Invisible apply=false] condition until the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s &Reference[Concentration] ends on this effect, which ends early immediately after the [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes an attack roll or uses Consume Life.

mmVileAppearance.name: Vile Appearance
mmVileAppearance.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=FR0ETDHBas1Z5LfF]], any [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=FR0ETDHBas1Z5LfF]] that starts its turn within [[lookup @range.value activity=FR0ETDHBas1Z5LfF]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and can see the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s true form.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the start of its next turn.

Success: The target is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Horrific Appearance for 24 hours.

mmVortex00000000.name: Vortex
mmVortex00000000.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=cZy0VYbCVY8aRB4z]], one [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=cZy0VYbCVY8aRB4z]] in the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s space.

Failure: [[/damage average activity=cZy0VYbCVY8aRB4z]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]). Until the grapple ends, the target can't cast spells with a Verbal component and takes [[/damage average activity=kDz92inkRCjGrPiz]] damage at the start of each of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s turns.

mmWarCry00000000.name: War Cry
mmWarCry00000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] or one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=uN0VTW2Fqig7YAs9]] of its choice that can see or hear it gains [[/healing average temp]] and has Advantage on attack rolls until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

mmWaterBreathing.name: Water Breathing
mmWaterBreathing.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can breathe only underwater. It can hold its breath for 1 hour outside water.

mmWaterForm00000.name: Water Form
mmWaterForm00000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can enter an enemy's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without expending extra movement to do so.

mmWaterSusceptib.name: Water Susceptibility
mmWaterSusceptib.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes 3 (1d6) Cold damage damage for every 5 feet the [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves in water or for every gallon of water splashed on it.

Foundry Note

Scaling is configured to roll the correct number of dice based on the distance traveled through water. 1 is default for 5 feet, 2 is for 10 feet, and so forth.

mmWeakeningBreat.name: Weakening Breath
mmWeakeningBreat.description:
Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=EGZ4bS4HpJkfNG9s]], each creature that isn't currently affected by this breath in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=EGZ4bS4HpJkfNG9s]]-foot Cone.

Failure: The target has Disadvantage on Strength-based D20 Tests and subtracts 3 ([[/r 1d6]]) from its damage rolls. It repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After [[lookup @duration.value activity=EGZ4bS4HpJkfNG9s]] minute, it succeeds automatically.

mmWeb00000000000.name: Web
mmWeb00000000000.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=6iMoUgxwYlvfKTXr]], one creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=6iMoUgxwYlvfKTXr]] feet.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the web is destroyed (AC 10; HP 5; Vulnerability to Fire damage; Immunity to Poison and Psychic damage).

mmWebStrand00000.name: Web Strand
mmWebStrand00000.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Ln5NXBaHGKlwdoiP]], one Large or smaller [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=Ln5NXBaHGKlwdoiP]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=Ln5NXBaHGKlwdoiP]] feet.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the web is destroyed (AC 10; HP 5; Vulnerability to Fire damage; Immunity to Bludgeoning, Poison, and Psychic damage).

mmWebWalker00000.name: Web Walker
mmWebWalker00000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] ignores movement restrictions caused by webs, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] knows the location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

mmWeightOfYears0.name: Weight of Years
mmWeightOfYears0.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=xZul1ImCP658OBv3]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=xZul1ImCP658OBv3]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=xZul1ImCP658OBv3]] feet.

Failure: The target gains 1 &Reference[Exhaustion apply=false] level. While the target has any Exhaustion levels, it appears [[/r 3d10]] years older.

Failure or Success: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

mmWeirdInsight00.name: Weird Insight
mmWeirdInsight00.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=o6eFmn0HWGbQjzdG]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=o6eFmn0HWGbQjzdG]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=o6eFmn0HWGbQjzdG]] feet.

Failure: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] magically learns one fact or secret about the target.

mmWhelm000000000.name: Whelm
mmWhelm000000000.description:
Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=TQchFj2VXXJgU7Lq]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=TQchFj2VXXJgU7Lq]] in the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s space.

Failure: [[/damage average activity=TQchFj2VXXJgU7Lq]] damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]). Until the grapple ends, the target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition, is &Reference[suffocating]{suffocating} unless it can breathe water, and takes [[/damage average activity=khxVwH3AB0sx1qRG]] damage at the start of each of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s turns. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can grapple one Large creature or up to two Medium or smaller creatures at a time with Whelm.

As an action, a creature within 5 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can pull a creature out of it by succeeding on a [[/check ath dc=@skills.ath.passive format=long]].

Success: Half damage only.

mmWhirlwind00000.name: Whirlwind
mmWhirlwind00000.description:
Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=GQzr4EMMm6kkZVdC]], each Medium or smaller [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=GQzr4EMMm6kkZVdC]] in the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s space.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target is pushed up to 20 feet straight away from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

Success: Half damage only.

mmWishes00000000.name: Wishes
mmWishes00000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has a [[/r 1d100cs<31#Knows Wish on 1]]{30 percent} chance of knowing the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplWish000000]{Wish} spell. If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] knows it, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can cast it only on behalf of a non-genie creature who communicates a wish in a way the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can understand. If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts the spell for the creature, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] suffers none of the spell's stress. Once the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has cast it three times, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't do so again for 365 days.

n05XvhItAfMasHVO.name: Find Familiar
n05XvhItAfMasHVO.description:
You gain the service of a familiar, a spirit that takes an animal form you choose: Bat, Cat, Frog, Hawk, Lizard, Octopus, Owl, Rat, Raven, Spider, Weasel, or another Beast that has a Challenge Rating of 0. Appearing in an unoccupied space within range, the familiar has the statistics of the chosen form (see appendix B), though it is a Celestial, Fey, or Fiend (your choice) instead of a Beast. Your familiar acts independently of you, but it obeys your commands.

Telepathic Connection. While your familiar is within 100 feet of you, you can communicate with it telepathically. Additionally, as a Bonus Action, you can see through the familiar's eyes and hear what it hears until the start of your next turn, gaining the benefits of any special senses it has.

Finally, when you cast a spell with a range of touch, your familiar can deliver the touch. Your familiar must be within 100 feet of you, and it must take a Reaction to deliver the touch when you cast the spell.

Combat. The familiar is an ally to you and your allies. It rolls its own Initiative and acts on its own turn. A familiar can't attack, but it can take other actions as normal.

Disappearance of the Familiar. When the familiar drops to 0 Hit Points, it disappears. It reappears after you cast this spell again. As a Magic action, you can temporarily dismiss the familiar to a pocket dimension. Alternatively, you can dismiss it forever. As a Magic action while it is temporarily dismissed, you can cause it to reappear in an unoccupied space within 30 feet of you. Whenever the familiar drops to 0 Hit Points or disappears into the pocket dimension, it leaves behind in its space anything it was wearing or carrying.

One Familiar Only. You can't have more than one familiar at a time. If you cast this spell while you have a familiar, you instead cause it to adopt a new eligible form.
n05XvhItAfMasHVO.materials_component: burning incense worth 10+ GP, which the spell consumes

n7uKSkGfYqj4FjU6.name: Tongues
n7uKSkGfYqj4FjU6.description: This spell grants the creature you touch the ability to understand any spoken or signed language that it hears or sees. Moreover, when the target communicates by speaking or signing, any creature that knows at least one language can understand it if that creature can hear the speech or see the signing.

nCkhRnrrGKCLIAOG.name: Major Image
nCkhRnrrGKCLIAOG.description:
You create the image of an object, a creature, or some other visible phenomenon that is no larger than a 20-foot Cube. The image appears at a spot that you can see within range and lasts for the duration. It seems real, including sounds, smells, and temperature appropriate to the thing depicted, but it can't deal damage or cause conditions.

If you are within range of the illusion, you can take a Magic action to cause the image to move to any other spot within range. As the image changes location, you can alter its appearance so that its movements appear natural for the image. For example, if you create an image of a creature and move it, you can alter the image so that it appears to be walking. Similarly, you can cause the illusion to make different sounds at different times, even making it carry on a conversation, for example.

Physical interaction with the image reveals it to be an illusion, for things can pass through it. A creature that takes a Study action to examine the image can determine that it is an illusion with a successful [[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spell.dc]] check against your spell save DC. If a creature discerns the illusion for what it is, the creature can see through the image, and its other sensory qualities become faint to the creature.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The spell lasts until dispelled, without requiring Concentration, if cast with a level 4+ spell slot.

nEBoPZejGFPgIfWu.name: Thaumaturgy
nEBoPZejGFPgIfWu.description:
You manifest a minor wonder within range. You create one of the effects below within range. If you cast this spell multiple times, you can have up to three of its 1-minute effects active at a time.

Altered Eyes. You alter the appearance of your eyes for 1 minute.

Booming Voice. Your voice booms up to three times as loud as normal for 1 minute. For the duration, you have Advantage on [[/check ability=cha skill=itm]] checks.

Fire Play. You cause flames to flicker, brighten, dim, or change color for 1 minute.

Invisible Hand. You instantaneously cause an unlocked door or window to fly open or slam shut.

Phantom Sound. You create an instantaneous sound that originates from a point of your choice within range, such as a rumble of thunder, the cry of a raven, or ominous whispers.

Tremors. You cause harmless tremors in the ground for 1 minute.

nVRTlv14fzhoDhWf.name: Control Weather
nVRTlv14fzhoDhWf.description:
You take control of the weather within 5 miles of you for the duration. You must be outdoors to cast this spell, and it ends early if you go indoors.

When you cast the spell, you change the current weather conditions, which are determined by the DM. You can change precipitation, temperature, and wind. It takes 1d4 × 10 minutes for the new conditions to take effect. Once they do so, you can change the conditions again. When the spell ends, the weather gradually returns to normal.

When you change the weather conditions, find a current condition on the following tables and change its stage by one, up or down. When changing the wind, you can change its direction.

Precipitation
StageCondition
1Clear
2Light clouds
3Overcast or ground fog
4Rain, hail, or snow
5Torrential rain, driving hail, or blizzard
Temperature
StageCondition
1Heat wave
2Hot
3Warm
4Cool
5Cold
6Freezing
Wind
StageCondition
1Calm
2Moderate wind
3Strong wind
4Gale
5Storm

ndzmsLuNebehyo3i.name: Plane Shift
ndzmsLuNebehyo3i.description:
You and up to eight willing creatures who link hands in a circle are transported to a different plane of existence. You can specify a target destination in general terms, such as the City of Brass on the Elemental Plane of Fire or the palace of Dispater on the second level of the Nine Hells, and you appear in or near that destination, as determined by the DM.

Alternatively, if you know the sigil sequence of a teleportation circle on another plane of existence, this spell can take you to that circle. If the teleportation circle is too small to hold all the creatures you transported, they appear in the closest unoccupied spaces next to the circle.
ndzmsLuNebehyo3i.materials_component: a forked, metal rod worth 250+ GP and attuned to a plane of existence

nfMwA64qsTbhzRka.name: Zone of Truth
nfMwA64qsTbhzRka.description:
You create a magical zone that guards against deception in a 15-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point within range. Until the spell ends, a creature that enters the spell's area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there makes a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, a creature can't speak a deliberate lie while in the radius. You know whether a creature succeeds or fails on this save.

An affected creature is aware of the spell and can avoid answering questions to which it would normally respond with a lie. Such a creature can be evasive yet must be truthful.

ngMn9mjUa63VWbHY.name: Dominate Person
ngMn9mjUa63VWbHY.description:
One Humanoid you can see within range must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or have the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition for the duration. The target has Advantage on the save if you or your allies are fighting it. Whenever the target takes damage, it repeats the save, ending the spell on itself on a success.

You have a telepathic link with the Charmed target while the two of you are on the same plane of existence. On your turn, you can use this link to issue commands to the target (no action required), such as "Attack that creature," "Move over there," or "Fetch that object." The target does its best to obey on its turn. If it completes an order and doesn't receive further direction from you, it acts and moves as it likes, focusing on protecting itself.

You can command the target to take a Reaction but must take your own Reaction to do so.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. Your Concentration can last longer with a spell slot of level 6 (up to 10 minutes), 7 (up to 1 hour), or 8+ (up to 8 hours).

nx98etdOuNlIWdf6.name: Mage Hand
nx98etdOuNlIWdf6.description:
A spectral, floating hand appears at a point you choose within range. The hand lasts for the duration. The hand vanishes if it is ever more than 30 feet away from you or if you cast this spell again.

When you cast the spell, you can use the hand to manipulate an object, open an unlocked door or container, stow or retrieve an item from an open container, or pour the contents out of a vial.

As a Magic action on your later turns, you can control the hand thus again. As part of that action, you can move the hand up to 30 feet.

The hand can't attack, activate magic items, or carry more than 10 pounds.

nxupE3blwBUB9vqZ.name: Lightning Bolt
nxupE3blwBUB9vqZ.description:
A stroke of lightning forming a 100-foot-long, 5-foot-wide Line blasts out from you in a direction you choose. Each creature in the Line makes a Dexterity saving throw, taking 8d6 Lightning damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d6 for each spell slot level above 3.
nxupE3blwBUB9vqZ.materials_component: a bit of fur and a crystal rod

o9zHpjCrGZEcIJzZ.name: Dispel Magic
o9zHpjCrGZEcIJzZ.description:
Choose one creature, object, or magical effect within range. Any ongoing spell of level 3 or lower on the target ends. For each ongoing spell of level 4 or higher on the target, make an ability check using your spellcasting ability (DC 10 plus that spell's level). On a successful check, the spell ends.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You automatically end a spell on the target if the spell's level is equal to or less than the level of the spell slot you use.

oVhABdKIr7rLqUKQ.name: Thaumaturgy
oVhABdKIr7rLqUKQ.description:
You manifest a minor wonder within range. You create one of the effects below within range. If you cast this spell multiple times, you can have up to three of its 1-minute effects active at a time.

Altered Eyes. You alter the appearance of your eyes for 1 minute.

Booming Voice. Your voice booms up to three times as loud as normal for 1 minute. For the duration, you have Advantage on [[/check ability=cha skill=itm]] checks.

Fire Play. You cause flames to flicker, brighten, dim, or change color for 1 minute.

Invisible Hand. You instantaneously cause an unlocked door or window to fly open or slam shut.

Phantom Sound. You create an instantaneous sound that originates from a point of your choice within range, such as a rumble of thunder, the cry of a raven, or ominous whispers.

Tremors. You cause harmless tremors in the ground for 1 minute.

ovOl8m4PyxnQNcMs.name: Fireball
ovOl8m4PyxnQNcMs.description:
A bright streak flashes from you to a point you choose within range and then blossoms with a low roar into a fiery explosion. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius Sphere centered on that point makes a Dexterity saving throw, taking 8d6 Fire damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

Flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried start burning.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d6 for each spell slot level above 3.
ovOl8m4PyxnQNcMs.materials_component: a ball of bat guano and sulfur

ovdN9mRTyXP1j08C.name: Detect Evil and Good
ovdN9mRTyXP1j08C.description:
For the duration, you sense the location of any Aberration, Celestial, Elemental, Fey, Fiend, or Undead within 30 feet of yourself. You also sense whether the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplHallow0000]{Hallow} spell is active there and, if so, where.

The spell is blocked by 1 foot of stone, dirt, or wood; 1 inch of metal; or a thin sheet of lead.

ovjYLr2qHJA652lq.name: Shatter
ovjYLr2qHJA652lq.description:
A loud noise erupts from a point of your choice within range. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius Sphere centered there makes a Constitution saving throw, taking 3d8 Thunder damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. A Construct has Disadvantage on the save.

A nonmagical object that isn't being worn or carried also takes the damage if it's in the spell's area.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d8 for each spell slot level above 2.

ow9dnt0OerJUfLau.name: Detect Magic
ow9dnt0OerJUfLau.description:
For the duration, you sense the presence of magical effects within 30 feet of yourself. If you sense such effects, you can take the Magic action to see a faint aura around any visible creature or object in the area that bears the magic, and if an effect was created by a spell, you learn the spell's school of magic.

The spell is blocked by 1 foot of stone, dirt, or wood; 1 inch of metal; or a thin sheet of lead.

pB2kBCFQfO3vNHBI.name: Etherealness
pB2kBCFQfO3vNHBI.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplEtherealne]{Etherealness} spell, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is visible on the Material Plane while on the Border Ethereal and vice versa, but it can't affect or be affected by anything on the other plane.

pCbNvhCgaWNbNwvp.name: Magic Missile
pCbNvhCgaWNbNwvp.description:
You create three glowing darts of magical force. Each dart strikes a creature of your choice that you can see within range. A dart deals 1d4 + 1 Force damage to its target. The darts all strike simultaneously, and you can direct them to hit one creature or several.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The spell creates one more dart for each spell slot level above 1.

[[2 + @item.level]]{Level [[lookup @item.level]] darts}

pGP49eWCVXNRQplJ.name: Detect Magic
pGP49eWCVXNRQplJ.description:
For the duration, you sense the presence of magical effects within 30 feet of yourself. If you sense such effects, you can take the Magic action to see a faint aura around any visible creature or object in the area that bears the magic, and if an effect was created by a spell, you learn the spell's school of magic.

The spell is blocked by 1 foot of stone, dirt, or wood; 1 inch of metal; or a thin sheet of lead.

pH1Rf3FfwlD3EELa.name: Fog Cloud
pH1Rf3FfwlD3EELa.description:
You create a 20-foot-radius Sphere of fog centered on a point within range. The Sphere is &Reference[heavilyobscured]. It lasts for the duration or until a strong wind (such as one created by @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplGustofWind]{Gust of Wind}) disperses it.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The fog's radius increases by 20 feet for each spell slot level above 1.

pRJU7bqMNKx6FDJS.name: Shapechange
pRJU7bqMNKx6FDJS.description:
You shape-shift into another creature for the duration or until you take a Magic action to shape-shift into a different eligible form. The new form must be of a creature that has a Challenge Rating no higher than your level or Challenge Rating. You must have seen the sort of creature before, and it can't be a Construct or an Undead.

When you shape-shift, you gain a number of Temporary Hit Points equal to the Hit Points of the form. The spell ends early if you have no Temporary Hit Points left.

Your game statistics are replaced by the stat block of the chosen form, but you retain your creature type; alignment; personality; Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores; Hit Points; Hit Point Dice; proficiencies; and ability to communicate. If you have the Spellcasting feature, you retain it too.

Upon shape-shifting, you determine whether your equipment drops to the ground or changes in size and shape to fit the new form while you're in it.

pTeocF4StpOtAxCp.name: Bless
pTeocF4StpOtAxCp.description:
You bless up to three creatures within range. Whenever a target makes an attack roll or a saving throw before the spell ends, the target adds 1d4 to the attack roll or save.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 1.

phbaoiAttackSpir.name: Move and Attack
phbaoiAttackSpir.description:
As a Bonus Action on your later turns, you can move the force up to 20 feet and repeat the attack against a creature within 5 feet of it. On a hit, the target takes Force damage equal to 1d8 plus your spellcasting ability modifier.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d8 for every slot level above 2.

phbaoiBite000000.name: Bite
phbaoiBite000000.description: At the start of each of your turns, the hound attempts to bite one enemy within 5 feet of it. That enemy must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 4d8 Force damage.

phbaoiBreathWeap.name: Breath Weapon
phbaoiBreathWeap.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC equals your spell save DC, each creature in a 30-foot Cone. Failure: 2d6 damage of a type this spirit has Resistance to (your choice when you cast the spell). Success: Half damage.

phbaoiClenchedFi.name: Clenched Fist
phbaoiClenchedFi.description: The hand strikes a target within 5 feet of it. Make a melee spell attack. On a hit, the target takes 5d8 Force damage.

phbaoiCompressio.name: Compression
phbaoiCompressio.description: The octopus can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without spending extra movement to do so.

phbaoiFellGlareF.name: Fell Glare
phbaoiFellGlareF.description: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC equals your spell save DC, one creature within 60 feet the steed can see. Failure: The target has the &Reference[frightened] condition until the end of your next turn.

phbaoiFeyStepFey.name: Fey Step
phbaoiFeyStepFey.description: The steed teleports, along with its rider, to an unoccupied space of your choice up to 60 feet away from itself.

phbaoiFlamingSph.name: Roll
phbaoiFlamingSph.description:
As a Bonus Action, you can move the sphere up to 30 feet, rolling it along the ground. If you move the sphere into a creature's space, that creature makes the save against the sphere, and the sphere stops moving for the turn.

When you move the sphere, you can direct it over barriers up to 5 feet tall and jump it across pits up to 10 feet wide. Flammable objects that aren't being worn or carried start burning if touched by the sphere.

phbaoiForcefulHa.name: Forceful Hand
phbaoiForcefulHa.description: The hand attempts to push a Huge or smaller creature within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a Strength saving throw, or the hand pushes the target up to 5 feet plus a number of feet equal to five times your spellcasting ability modifier. The hand moves with the target, remaining within 5 feet of it.

phbaoiGraspingHa.name: Grasping Hand
phbaoiGraspingHa.description:
The hand attempts to grapple a Huge or smaller creature within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw, or the target has the &Reference[Grappled] condition, with an escape DC equal to your spell save DC. While the hand grapples the target, you can take a Bonus Action to cause the hand to crush it, dealing Bludgeoning damage to the target equal to 4d6 plus your spellcasting ability modifier.

Grapple Escape Tests

[[/check ability=str skill=ath dc=8+@prof+@flags.dnd5e.summon.mod]]{Strength (Athletics)} [[/check ability=dex skill=acr dc=8+@prof+@flags.dnd5e.summon.mod]]{Dexterity (Acrobatics)}

phbaoiHealingTou.name: Healing Touch
phbaoiHealingTou.description: One creature within 5 feet of the steed regains a number of Hit Points equal to 2d8 plus the spell's level.

phbaoiHooves0000.name: Hooves
phbaoiHooves0000.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) Bludgeoning damage.

phbaoiInkCloud1D.name: Ink Cloud
phbaoiInkCloud1D.description: Trigger: A creature ends its turn within 5 feet of the octopus while underwater. Response: The octopus releases ink that fills a 5-foot Cube centered on itself, and the octopus moves up to its Swim Speed. The Cube is &Reference[heavilyobscured] for 1 minute or until a strong current or similar effect disperses the ink.

phbaoiInterposin.name: Interposing Hand
phbaoiInterposin.description: The hand grants you &Reference[HalfCover] against attacks and other effects that originate from its space or that pass through it. In addition, its space counts as &Reference[DifficultTerrain] for your enemies.

phbaoiLevel4Conj.name: Guarded Area
phbaoiLevel4Conj.description:
Any enemy that moves to a space within 10 feet of the guardian for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there makes a Dexterity saving throw, taking 20 Radiant damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. The guardian vanishes when it has dealt a total of 60 damage.

Foundry Note

This feature's Limited Uses is optionally provided for tracking the total damage dealt by the guardian. Additionally, The Consume Damage Pool activity is configured with scaling uses consumption in increments of 5 damage for use after the final damage is determined and applied.

phbaoiLifeBond00.name: Life Bond
phbaoiLifeBond00.description: When you regain Hit Points from a level 1+ spell, the steed regains the same number of Hit Points if you're within 5 feet of it.

phbaoiMultiattac.name: Multiattack
phbaoiMultiattac.description:
The insect makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (round down).

[[floor(@flags.dnd5e.summon.level / 2)]]{Number of attacks}

phbaoiOtherworld.name: Otherworldly Slam
phbaoiOtherworld.description: Melee Attack Roll: Bonus equals your spell attack modifier, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1d8 plus the spell's level of Necrotic damage.

phbaoiPoisonJab0.name: Poison Jab
phbaoiPoisonJab0.description: Melee Attack Roll: Bonus equals your spell attack modifier, reach 10 ft. Hit: 1d6 + 3 plus the spell's level Piercing damage plus 1d4 Poison damage.

phbaoiRend000000.name: Rend
phbaoiRend000000.description: Melee Attack: Bonus equals your spell attack modifier, reach 10 feet. Hit: 1d6 + 4 + the spell's level Piercing damage.

phbaoiSharedResi.name: Shared Resistances
phbaoiSharedResi.description:
When you summon the spirit, choose one of its Resistances. You have &Reference[damageresistance]{Resistance} to the chosen damage type until the spell ends.

Foundry Note

Active effects and activities applying those effects on this item are provided for optional application of the chosen resistance.

phbaoiSlam000000.name: Slam
phbaoiSlam000000.description: Melee Attack Roll: Bonus equals your spell attack modifier, reach 5 ft. Hit: Force damage equal to 1d4 + 3.

phbaoiSpiderClim.name: Spider Climb
phbaoiSpiderClim.description: The insect can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

phbaoiTentacles0.name: Tentacles
phbaoiTentacles0.description: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1 Bludgeoning damage.

phbaoiVenomousSp.name: Venomous Spew
phbaoiVenomousSp.description: Constitution Saving Throw: Your spell save DC, one creature the insect can see within 10 feet. Failure: The target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the start of the insect's next turn.

phbaoiWebBoltSpi.name: Web Bolt
phbaoiWebBoltSpi.description: Ranged Attack Roll: Bonus equals your spell attack modifier, range 60 ft. Hit: 1d10 + 3 plus the spell's level Bludgeoning damage, and the target's Speed is reduced to 0 until the start of the insect's next turn.

phbaoiWizard0000.name: Move
phbaoiWizard0000.description: As a Bonus Action, you can move the eye up to 30 feet in any direction. A solid barrier blocks the eye's movement, but the eye can pass through an opening as small as 1 inch in diameter.

phbcftPackDamage.name: Pack Damage
phbcftPackDamage.description: Whenever the pack moves within 10 feet of a creature you can see and whenever a creature you can see enters a space within 10 feet of the pack or ends its turn there, you can force that creature to make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 3d10 Slashing damage. A creature makes this save only once per turn.

phbftFlamingSphe.name: Flames
phbftFlamingSphe.description: You create a 5-foot-diameter sphere of fire in an unoccupied space on the ground within range. It lasts for the duration. Any creature that ends its turn within 5 feet of the sphere makes a Dexterity saving throw, taking 2d6 Fire damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

phbftMordenkaine.name: Move and Attack
phbftMordenkaine.description: On your later turns, you can take a Bonus Action to move the sword up to 30 feet to a spot you can see and repeat the attack against the same target or a different one. On a hit, the target takes Force damage equal to 4d12 plus your spellcasting ability modifier.

po1oMMVa5As09ueX.name: Shapechange
po1oMMVa5As09ueX.description:
You shape-shift into another creature for the duration or until you take a Magic action to shape-shift into a different eligible form. The new form must be of a creature that has a Challenge Rating no higher than your level or Challenge Rating. You must have seen the sort of creature before, and it can't be a Construct or an Undead.

When you shape-shift, you gain a number of Temporary Hit Points equal to the Hit Points of the form. The spell ends early if you have no Temporary Hit Points left.

Your game statistics are replaced by the stat block of the chosen form, but you retain your creature type; alignment; personality; Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores; Hit Points; Hit Point Dice; proficiencies; and ability to communicate. If you have the Spellcasting feature, you retain it too.

Upon shape-shifting, you determine whether your equipment drops to the ground or changes in size and shape to fit the new form while you're in it.

ppISVKQQqC18ap6D.name: Detect Magic
ppISVKQQqC18ap6D.description:
For the duration, you sense the presence of magical effects within 30 feet of yourself. If you sense such effects, you can take the Magic action to see a faint aura around any visible creature or object in the area that bears the magic, and if an effect was created by a spell, you learn the spell's school of magic.

The spell is blocked by 1 foot of stone, dirt, or wood; 1 inch of metal; or a thin sheet of lead.

q6QIeb22Jwvnb6cR.name: Etherealness
q6QIeb22Jwvnb6cR.description:
You step into the border regions of the Ethereal Plane, where it overlaps with your current plane. You remain in the Border Ethereal for the duration. During this time, you can move in any direction. If you move up or down, every foot of movement costs an extra foot. You can perceive the plane you left, which looks gray, and you can't see anything there more than 60 feet away.

While on the Ethereal Plane, you can affect and be affected only by creatures, objects, and effects on that plane. Creatures that aren't on the Ethereal Plane can't perceive or interact with you unless a feature gives them the ability to do so.

When the spell ends, you return to the plane you left in the spot that corresponds to your space in the Border Ethereal. If you appear in an occupied space, you are shunted to the nearest unoccupied space and take Force damage equal to twice the number of feet you are moved.

This spell ends instantly if you cast it while you are on the Ethereal Plane or a plane that doesn't border it, such as one of the Outer Planes.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot.You can target up to three willing creatures (including yourself) for each spell slot level above 7. The creatures must be within 10 feet of you when you cast the spell.

qJROiSCEROFUzokI.name: Thaumaturgy
qJROiSCEROFUzokI.description:
You manifest a minor wonder within range. You create one of the effects below within range. If you cast this spell multiple times, you can have up to three of its 1-minute effects active at a time.

Altered Eyes. You alter the appearance of your eyes for 1 minute.

Booming Voice. Your voice booms up to three times as loud as normal for 1 minute. For the duration, you have Advantage on [[/check ability=cha skill=itm]] checks.

Fire Play. You cause flames to flicker, brighten, dim, or change color for 1 minute.

Invisible Hand. You instantaneously cause an unlocked door or window to fly open or slam shut.

Phantom Sound. You create an instantaneous sound that originates from a point of your choice within range, such as a rumble of thunder, the cry of a raven, or ominous whispers.

Tremors. You cause harmless tremors in the ground for 1 minute.

qLsO05aCvad2nWG6.name: Remove Curse
qLsO05aCvad2nWG6.description: At your touch, all curses affecting one creature or object end. If the object is a cursed magic item, its curse remains, but the spell breaks its owner's Attunement to the object so it can be removed or discarded.

qTBTEe8TiMkQRtRA.name: Identify
qTBTEe8TiMkQRtRA.description:
You touch an object throughout the spell's casting. If the object is a magic item or some other magical object, you learn its properties and how to use them, whether it requires Attunement, and how many charges it has, if any. You learn whether any ongoing spells are affecting the item and what they are. If the item was created by a spell, you learn that spell's name.

If you instead touch a creature throughout the casting, you learn which ongoing spells, if any, are currently affecting it.

qi4FBfGudzDz6Lei.name: Commune
qi4FBfGudzDz6Lei.description:
You contact a deity or a divine proxy and ask up to three questions that can be answered with yes or no. You must ask your questions before the spell ends. You receive a correct answer for each question.

Divine beings aren't necessarily omniscient, so you might receive "unclear" as an answer if a question pertains to information that lies beyond the deity's knowledge. In a case where a one-word answer could be misleading or contrary to the deity's interests, the DM might offer a short phrase as an answer instead.

If you cast the spell more than once before finishing a Long Rest, there is a cumulative 25 percent chance for each casting after the first that you get no answer.

rHwlDG85kUcrUFdg.name: Slow
rHwlDG85kUcrUFdg.description:
You alter time around up to six creatures of your choice in a 40-foot Cube within range. Each target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be affected by this spell for the duration.

An affected target's Speed is halved, it takes a −2 penalty to AC and Dexterity saving throws, and it can't take Reactions. On its turns, it can take either an action or a Bonus Action, not both, and it can make only one attack if it takes the Attack action. If it casts a spell with a Somatic component, there is a [[/r 1d100cs<=25#Slowed spell cast success]]{25 percent} chance the spell fails as a result of the target making the spell's gestures too slowly.

An affected target repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the spell on itself on a success.

Foundry Note

The inline roll above will return 1 if it succeeded or 0 if it failed.

rnHaNNaeCidsdNoG.name: Speak with Animals
rnHaNNaeCidsdNoG.description:
For the duration, you can comprehend and verbally communicate with Beasts, and you can use any of the Influence action's skill options with them.
